help.rule_001:
1. You have <color=#c05100>5</color> free chances to challenge an opponent in the Arena each day. Additional challenge attempts can be purchased. If the current number of attempts exceeds the limit, it will reset to the maximum number at 0:00 every day.

2. Each battle is limited to 15 rounds. If the winner is not determined by then, the team with the higher remaining HP percentage compared to the initial total HP wins.

3. Initiating battle and winning earns Arena Points and deducts points from losers. Points for both parties remain the same if the Attacker loses.

4. Collect points to increase your tier. Starting from the Master tier, there will be limits on the total number of players in a tier in addition to the point requirements.

5. Attackers will face defensive lineups in the Arena.

6. Daily Tier Rewards are tallied at <color=#c05100>21:00</color> every day. A season lasts 7 days. Season Rewards are tallied at <color=#c05100>23:45</color> on Sunday and sent via mail.

7. At the end of a season, Arena Points will be partially reduced based on the tier of the previous season. A new season begins on Monday at 00:00 after a 15-minute break.
help.story_001:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The Imperial Arena was commissioned by the founder of the Imperial City. It's where the most elite warriors from all over the land face each other and vie for the love and adoration of the people.
   After the Demons' invasion, it was left deserted for a while. Now, the city lord has ordered the reopening of tournaments to inspire the strong and reward warriors who emerge victorious in battle.
help.rule_002:
1. Oracle Summons cost Oracle Decrees.

2. Each decree can summon a hero once from the respective faction's Oracle Cards.

3. There is a chance to summon 4-star or 5-star Heroes or their shards.

4. After a certain number of summons from the same faction, you're guaranteed to summon a Legendary hero.

5. Each summon rewards you with 1 Oracle Coin, which can be exchanged for specific heroes in the Oracle Shop.
help.story_002:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The Oracle Temple is where the Imperial City's citizens worship and make offerings to their gods. After so much turmoil, destruction, and reconstruction, the Oracle Temple now stands as the center of the Imperial City's faith.
   Countless commoners come here daily to pray to the gods, despite most of them being ignorant as to the sanctity of the gods they worship.
   However, these citizens believe that as long as they are reverent enough, their gods will definitely answer their prayers.
help.rule_003:
1. Spend Invoker Crystals or Diamonds to perform Relic Prayers.

2. 30 prayers guarantee a full Rare or Epic Relic.

3. Repeatedly drawing uncommon or Rare relics and relic shards that are already at max stars will be automatically converted into Soul Crystals.

4. Repeatedly drawing epic or legendary relics and relic shards that are already at max stars will be automatically converted into Soul Crystal II.
help.story_003:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The Relic Vault can connect the soul of a supplicant with certain lost Relics. By dripping their blood on an offering, the supplicant can hear the Relic's low hum.
   If the supplicant's soul is deemed worthy, the Relic will appear in their hands from thin air. However, should they be deemed unworthy... their soul will never be whole again.
help.rule_004:
1. The difficulty in Palace of Penrose gradually increases. Defeat the enemies in the underground palace for huge rewards.

2. Extra rewards can be claimed for every <color=#c05100>5</color> floors cleared. For every 100 floors cleared, the extra rewards obtained will be more generous.

3. Palace Rankings are based on the number of cleared floors.
help.story_004:
<color=#c05100>   </color>When exploring the Frostnight Cave, people discovered the Palace of Penrose—an ancient structure unearthed by the Eclipse. The entrance to the palace was wide open, with countless intersecting flights of stairs towering within its deep and unfathomable interior. The entire space seemed endless.
   Nobody knows what kinds of monsters and trials lay within its depths, but such hazards would surely pale in comparison to its hidden treasures.
help.rule_005:
1. Use 3 or more Gems of the same quality to craft higher-quality Gems.

2. You can select secondary stat(s) to be inherited when crafting Gems of [Uncommon+] quality and above.

3. If no secondary stat(s) are selected, the secondary stats of the Gem will be randomly generated upon being crafted.
help.story_005: <color=#c05100>   </color>Gems of this type are different from the usual kinds of minerals, because a majority of such gems are in actuality the crystals of certain Vileflowers. It is said that wearing them on one's body can cause the wearer to obtain extraordinary power.
help.rule_006:
1. Up to <color=#c05100>60</color> friends can be added.

2. You can send Friendship Points to your friends up to <color=#c05100>30</color> times and receive from them up to <color=#c05100>30</color> times each day.

3. Friendship Points can be redeemed at the Limited Deals shop.
help.story_006: <color=#c05100>   </color>Make more friends! You'll surely be able to benefit from such friendships, am I right?
help.rule_007:
1. Forgotten Land has 4 Trial instances that offer different materials.

2. Each has stages of varied difficulty. Meet the clear condition for rewards and unlock the next stage. Players can claim idle rewards after clearing stages. These rewards accumulate over time.

3. Clear higher stages in instances to improve idle efficiency. The higher the efficiency, the better the rewards.

4. Deploy specified heroes in each instance to grant special buffs to the team.

5. Idle speed-ups can be purchased every day for each instance. Idle speed-ups cost Diamonds.

6. Wailing Mines and Corrupt Spring will be available on Monday, Wednesday, Friday, and Sunday; and Crystal Woods and Crimson Town will be available on Tuesday, Thursday, Saturday, and Sunday.

7. On the first 3 days after creating a character, all instances will be available for you to participate.
help.story_007:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The Forgotten Land was once the Empire's most affluent region. But after being invaded by the Eclipse, it became a terrifying magic-ravaged land.
   Today, monsters and specters roam throughout this intricately-structured town. If one wishes to obtain Gold and resources found here, they have no other choice but to raise their weapons and directly face the trials posed by the cursed.
help.rule_008:
1. Through Gold Purchase, players can earn Gold for a certain idle duration of the current Mission!

2. Different Alchemy grades have different calculations for idle durations.

3. The purchase limit for each grade resets every day at <color=#c05100>00:00</color> and <color=#c05100>12:00</color>.
help.story_008:
<color=#c05100>   </color>A man named Jace Carlin has found you, calling himself a "Great Alchemist" and claiming that he had already mastered the essence of alchemy. He also professed that he could turn any object into glittering Gold.
   Jace Carlin promised that he would demonstrate this ability to you for free; should you be intrigued by his demonstration, you would only need to pay a small price to learn more.
help.rule_009:
1. You can refresh for higher-tier Bounty Quests. Higher tiers give greater rewards.

2. There are <color=#c05100>3</color> free refreshes per day. Subsequent refreshes cost Bounty Refresh Orders or Diamonds.

3. The Bounty interface displays icons of the heroes' required stars and faction when selecting heroes to dispatch.

4. Bounty Quests require some time to complete, so dispatched heroes cannot take on other quests.

5. It costs Intel Points to accept Bounty Quests. Remember to use them in time because Intel Points that go over the capacity limit will go to waste.

6. Quick Bounty unlocks at Bounty Level 5.
help.story_009:
<color=#c05100>   </color>A variety of Bounty Quests are commonly posted on the Imperial City's noticeboards. Such quests primarily come from citizens who require some sort of assistance. Given that all manner of citizens post quests regardless of social class, Bounty Quests are naturally diverse in nature.
   By dispatching idle heroes to complete Bounty Quests of varying levels, teams will be able to obtain corresponding rewards from the citizens who posted these quests.
help.rule_010:
1. The rankings are updated in real time.

2. Power, Mission, Palace of Penrose, Arena, and Celestial Trials all have server achievement quests. Once <color=#c05100>a player</color> completes a quest, all players in their server obtain rewards.
help.story_010:
<color=#c05100>   </color>This monument was erected by the founder of the Imperial City in order to commend those who made outstanding contributions to the city.
   As time passed, the monument's original function of commemorating people gradually faded away and was replaced by praises and eulogies directed at the bravest of warriors. Every strong citizen should feel immensely proud that they have the privilege to immortalize themselves by leaving their name on the monument.
help.rule_011:
1. The Labyrinth opens once every 2 days, lasting 2 days each time.

2. Higher-difficulty Labyrinths yield richer rewards.

3. Each step forward in the Labyrinth triggers different events; resolve them to continue.

4. The Labyrinth contains hidden Soul Altars. Light them all to challenge the boss.

5. Defeating the boss awards Relic Shards and a chance to obtain a complete Relic.
help.story_011:
<color=#c05100>   </color>There are many secrets buried beneath the lava of Whisper Volcano.
   A magnificent palace once stood here. Rumor has it that its owner was Surtr—the God of Fire who was skilled at forging, and countless rare treasures were contained within. But after the long passage of time, the deity has long since passed, and the palace has been reduced to ruins.
   Treasure hunters are undoubtedly enticed by the treasures buried under the ruins.
   Unfortunately, this place is now occupied by a terrible being...
help.rule_012:
1. There are 6 instances in Celestial Trials. The sweep attempts are shared and reset each day.

2. 1 to 3 deployment bonuses are set on each floor. Bonuses are obtained if the number of deployed heroes satisfies the Synergy requirements.

3. 3 affixes are set for each floor. Choose any 1 of them before engaging in the challenge.

4. Bosses in subsequent stages will include mercenaries. Use the specified heroes with activated Rune Skills to effectively counter them.

5. Higher stages grant better rewards upon clearing and also drop higher-quality Runes.

6. Clear specified stages to claim a one-time reward.
help.story_012:
<color=#c05100>   </color>In ancient times, the Divines created the Celestial Trials for those seeking training. Elite enemies were conjured in the shrouded training ground, providing all kinds of challenges for the Divines to enhance their power. After the Demons were sealed, the Divines left the mortal world and the Celestial Trials was abandoned.
   After much time had passed, the Demons broke their seal, and the trial curtains were lifted once again. Only the strongest of warriors dare to undergo the trials once taken by the Divines.
help.rule_013:
1. Guild EXP raises Guild Level, which increases the Guild's member limit.

2. Guild donations earn Guild Contributions and some Guild EXP. The number of times Guild EXP can be earned from sign-ins each day cannot exceed the current member limit.

3. The Guild Leader can grant ordinary members the position of Captain, who has all rights except for changing the guild's name.

4. You cannot join or create another guild within 1 hour of quitting or disbanding a guild.

5. Activity progress source: You can get it by participating in the Grayshroom Realm and donating.
help.story_013:
<color=#c05100>   </color>To share intel more conveniently, certain Omniguardian teams chose to band together and form guilds.
   Within a guild, teams can explore new realms, challenge new elite enemies, and obtain plenty of bonus rewards.
help.rule_014:
Season Rules:
1. In each season, guilds will be matched in groups of 8 and compete in the Grayshroom Realm chapter progression within their respective groups.
2. The more points earned in the group ranking, the higher your guild's tier will be.
3. Each season consists of 8 rounds, each round starting on Friday and ending with the results on the following Thursday at 20:00. After the 8 rounds, the season points and tier will be calculated, and Season Rewards will be distributed.

Challenge Rules:
1. Realm instances consist of several chapters, each with 4 stages. Bosses in each stage have different traits.
2. Guild members can challenge bosses at these stages. Stages are cleared when all 4 bosses are defeated and you can move to the next chapter.
3. Choose the right opponents to deal the most damage. Higher damage dealt equals more rewards.
4. Each day, only a limited number of players can reduce the boss's HP, corresponding to the guild's current member limit. Any additional players challenging the boss will have their personal damage recorded as usual, but the boss's HP will remain unaffected.
5. Clearing a chapter grants the chance to open 1 chest.
6. Damage dealt to the guild boss will be converted to the corresponding percentage of HP and deducted from the main boss's total HP. There is a limit on the maximum amount of HP that can be deducted each time.
7. The challenge count recovers once every 2 hours, up to a maximum of 20 times. After a round is tallied, the challenge count will be automatically reset to 8 times.
8. Each season, based on the guild's zone, the room tier, and the competition round, a Blessing of the Brave will be granted at the start of each round. This blessing allows players to instantly clear a certain number of chapters (variable and subject to seasonal adjustments).
help.story_014:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The calamity of the Abyss has long passed, but the lingering shadow it left still shrouds the continent, and the Grayshroom Realm is one of them.
   The Grayshroom Realm was first discovered by the Empire's great sorcerer and later became known to various factions. This vast and boundless otherworldly space remains a mystery to this day, with no one able to glimpse its entirety. In order to unravel the secrets of this otherworldly space, the Empire, the Woodland, and the Eclipse factions all rushed to enter, but the outcome was devastating.
   At some point, rumors of ancient hidden treasures within this space began to circulate across the continent, attracting everyone's attention. Secrecy often implies treasures. As a result, an agreement was reached among the three major factions, allowing each faction to explore it. Every guild established magical gates leading to this otherworldly space. The decision of the three major factions proved effective. Although few were able to survive and return, the rich resources brought back by those survivors were enough to make them ecstatic. In comparison, the sacrifices seemed insignificant.
   As for the legendary ancient secrets, perhaps they were just lies concocted by the three major factions to lure others in!
help.rule_015:
1. Sage's Tome provides stat bonuses and passive skills for all ally heroes.

2. Use Grayshroom Ectoplasm to level up each talent bonus. Leveling up boosts the stats of the whole team or of a hero type.

3. Level up Trailblazer's Legacy to Lv.16 to unlock growth for 6 talent branches.

4. Obtain Glowing Spiritshroom when leveling up the major nodes of the 6 talent branches to a specific levels. Glowing Spiritshrooms can be used to unlock the corresponding talent page of the skill.
help.story_015:
<color=#c05100>   </color>Sage's Tome is a treasure that was found by guild members in an ancient terra. To display their unrivaled talent, guild mages used arcane magic to inscribe a magic circle onto the tome's parchment pages.
   Today, any team can enhance their stats and increase their power by infusing magic into the circle.
help.rule_017: Completing each Hero's story in the Legend Archive grants generous rewards.
help.story_017:
<color=#c05100>   </color>In actuality, this world has its own consciousness, one that continually follows earthly affairs as a silent observer.
   Any unusual or exciting stories are collated into volumes and displayed on the shelves of the Legend Archive.
   When one flips open the pages of one of these books, what lies before them are not merely stories, but also accounts of the characters' lives.
help.rule_018:
1. Spend Omniseal Shards to unlock the memories within the Omniseal and increase your team's stats.

2. When all 5 Clues for an Omniseal are unlocked, you get a complete memory and unlock the next Omniseal.
help.rule_019:
Gloomwoods comprises two game modes, Vileflower Assistance, and Terra Occupation.

1. The Gloomwoods Level can be increased by spending Gloomwoods EXP or challenging the Gloomwoods Defenders.

2. Increase Gloomwoods Level to obtain greater harvest from flower planting and unlock higher difficulty levels in Terra Occupation.

Vileflower Assistance

1. Spend 1 Feeding to obtain Vileflowers. Feeding Vileflowers will raise their quality.

2. The higher a Vileflower's quality during activation, the greater the rewards when harvesting it.

3. Other players can help you reduce the gathering time of your Vileflowers. You can also help them with theirs.

4. Feeding and Assistance attempts reset each day.

Terra Occupation

1. Terra Occupation comprises 3 difficulty levels that are unlocked at different Gloomwoods Levels.

2. Each difficulty level of the Terra Forest features a jungle of different qualities. Each jungle contains different qualities of terra.

3. The higher the quality of the terra seized, the greater the gains.

4. Defeat an occupier to obtain terra yield over time.

5. Initiating an occupation challenge will consume an Attack attempt regardless of the result. Attack attempts will regenerate over time.

6. After capturing a terra, extensions of occupation time can be purchased. Each extension is 8 hours and there is a limit of 3 purchases. Each time a terra is captured, the purchase limit of occupation extensions will be reset.

7. When a new terra is captured, occupation of the previous terra will be given up and the duration of occupation for this round will be reset to 24 hours.
help.story_019:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The Gloomwoods was once a vibrant forest, back when it was under the protection of the Tree of Life. Ever since the Demons' corruption extended to the Tree of Life, the Gloomwoods was also corroded by darkness.
   Today, the Gloomwoods is a putrid place. The flowers that were once watched over by the Tree of Life have distorted into Vileflowers that crave flesh and blood. By opening petals filled with brambles and thorns, these flowers capture and devour numerous foolhardy prey.
help.rule_020:
1. Heroes can be reborn. Rebirth returns 100% of resources spent on the hero level-ups and ascensions, and does not change their Stars.

2. Performing rebirth automatically removes the hero from all deployments.
help.story_020:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The origin of Flashback Tower resulted from an accident. Several members of the Mage Guild accidentally opened up a connection between time and space during one of their experiments.
   They soon discovered that time here flowed in the opposite direction from the outside world and this area allowed matter to be reduced to its most fundamental state.
   Therefore the Magic Institute transformed this place into a clock tower to carry out in-depth research of mysterious temporal magic.
help.rule_021:
1. Heroes disappear after dismantling, and materials and Hero Points are returned according to their stars.

2. Materials spent on upgrading the Heroes are also returned.

3. After dismantling, Heroes deployed in any mode will disappear as well.

4. A maximum of 15 Heroes can be dismantled at a time.

5. Only the initial 2-star and 3-star Heroes can be quick placed.
help.story_021:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The origin of Flashback Tower resulted from an accident. Several members of the Mage Guild accidentally opened up a connection between time and space during one of their experiments.
   They soon discovered that time here flowed in the opposite direction from the outside world and this area allowed matter to be reduced to its most fundamental state.
   Therefore the Magic Institute transformed this place into a clock tower to carry out in-depth research of mysterious temporal magic.
help.rule_022:
1. Heroes can be rerolled using specific materials.

2. When rerolled, the hero reverts to its initial stars and is reborn.

3. Rerolling a hero automatically removes it from all deployments.
help.story_022:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The origin of Flashback Tower resulted from an accident. Several members of the Mage Guild accidentally opened up a connection between time and space during one of their experiments.
   They soon discovered that time here flowed in the opposite direction from the outside world and this area allowed matter to be reduced to its most fundamental state.
   Therefore the Magic Institute transformed this place into a clock tower to carry out in-depth research of mysterious temporal magic.
help.rule_023:
1. You can spend materials to transform Heroes into different Heroes of the same faction.

2. Transformations are only available for Heroes in the 3 factions Empire, Woodland, and Eclipse.

3. Of those, only 5-star Heroes can be transformed.

4. There is a chance that they are transformed into the same Hero and no changes occur.

5. Heroes currently deployed in any mode cannot be transformed.
help.story_023:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The origin of Flashback Tower resulted from an accident. Several members of the Mage Guild accidentally opened up a connection between time and space during one of their experiments.
   They soon discovered that time here flowed in the opposite direction from the outside world and this area allowed matter to be reduced to its most fundamental state.
   Therefore the Magic Institute transformed this place into a clock tower to carry out in-depth research of mysterious temporal magic.
help.rule_024:
1. Gear can be reborn. Rebirth reverts Gear to its initial state and returns 100% of resources spent on its enhancements, refinements, enchantments, and promotions.

2. Performing rebirth on an equipped Gear automatically unequips it.
help.story_024:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The origin of Flashback Tower resulted from an accident. Several members of the Mage Guild accidentally opened up a connection between time and space during one of their experiments.
   They soon discovered that time here flowed in the opposite direction from the outside world and this area allowed matter to be reduced to its most fundamental state.
   Therefore the Magic Institute transformed this place into a clock tower to carry out in-depth research of mysterious temporal magic.
help.rule_025:
1. Gear disappears after dismantling, and materials are returned according to the initial tier.

2. Materials spent on upgrading the Gear are also returned.

3. Equipped Gear cannot be dismantled.

4. A max of 15 pieces of Gear can be dismantled at a time.

5. Only low-tier Gear be quick placed.
help.story_025:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The origin of Flashback Tower resulted from an accident. Several members of the Mage Guild accidentally opened up a connection between time and space during one of their experiments.
   They soon discovered that time here flowed in the opposite direction from the outside world and this area allowed matter to be reduced to its most fundamental state.
   Therefore the Magic Institute transformed this place into a clock tower to carry out in-depth research of mysterious temporal magic.
help.rule_026:
1. Gems disappear after dismantling, and materials are returned according to the initial quality tier.

2. Equipped Gems cannot be dismantled.

3. A max of 15 Gems can be dismantled at a time.

4. Only low-tier Gems be quick placed.
help.story_026:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The origin of Flashback Tower resulted from an accident. Several members of the Mage Guild accidentally opened up a connection between time and space during one of their experiments.
   They soon discovered that time here flowed in the opposite direction from the outside world and this area allowed matter to be reduced to its most fundamental state.
   Therefore the Magic Institute transformed this place into a clock tower to carry out in-depth research of mysterious temporal magic.
help.rule_027:
1. Runes can be reborn using specific materials.

2. Rebirths revert Runes to their initial condition and return 100% of materials spent on upgrading them.

3. Performing rebirth on Runes worn by Heroes automatically unequips them.
help.story_027:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The origin of Flashback Tower resulted from an accident. Several members of the Mage Guild accidentally opened up a connection between time and space during one of their experiments.
   They soon discovered that time here flowed in the opposite direction from the outside world and this area allowed matter to be reduced to its most fundamental state.
   Therefore the Magic Institute transformed this place into a clock tower to carry out in-depth research of mysterious temporal magic.
help.rule_028:
1. After a Rune is dismantled, all materials used on it are returned based on its initial quality.

2. Equipped Runes cannot be dismantled.

3. A max of 15 Runes can be dismantled at a time.

4. Only low-tier Runes can be auto-selected for dismantling.
help.story_028:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The origin of Flashback Tower resulted from an accident. Several members of the Mage Guild accidentally opened up a connection between time and space during one of their experiments.
   They soon discovered that time here flowed in the opposite direction from the outside world and this area allowed matter to be reduced to its most fundamental state.
   Therefore the Magic Institute transformed this place into a clock tower to carry out in-depth research of mysterious temporal magic.
help.rule_029:
1. All Relics (deployed or not) provide stat bonuses to all Heroes.

2. A Relic's Base ATK is equal to 20% of the currently deployed Heroes' total Base ATK.
help.story_029:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The former owners of these treasures were participants in the great war. Unfortunately, none of them were spared from its devastation.
   After years of amassing power, these Relics have developed unique and powerful abilities, and only those who are recognized by the Relics are allowed to harness them.
help.rule_030:
1. Relic Enhancement Level cannot exceed Player Level.

2. Quick Enhance can enhance up to 10 levels at a time.
help.story_030:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The former owners of these treasures were participants in the great war. Unfortunately, none of them were spared from its devastation.
   After years of amassing power, these Relics have developed unique and powerful abilities, and only those who are recognized by the Relics are allowed to harness them.
help.rule_031:
1. The first 6 ascensions require Refined Dust, while the last ascension requires Spirit of Forging.

2. Increasing Ascension Level unlocks the corresponding Relic talent.
help.story_031:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The former owners of these treasures were participants in the great war. Unfortunately, none of them were spared from its devastation.
   After years of amassing power, these Relics have developed unique and powerful abilities, and only those who are recognized by the Relics are allowed to harness them.
help.rule_032:
1. Advancing can grant many stat bonuses.

2. Advancing also raises skill stars, strengthening Relic Skills and possibly adding new skill effects.
help.story_032:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The former owners of these treasures were participants in the great war. Unfortunately, none of them were spared from its devastation.
   After years of amassing power, these Relics have developed unique and powerful abilities, and only those who are recognized by the Relics are allowed to harness them.
help.rule_033:
1. Use Terra Crystals to level up Hero Talents.

2. A hero's Faction Synergy is activated when the hero is advanced to 7-Star and both Talent branches reach Rare quality.

3. A hero's exclusive Talent Skill Level 1 is activated when both Talent branches reach Epic quality.

4. The Talent Skill Level 1 is upgraded to Level 2 when both Talent branches reach Legendary quality.

5. Resetting a hero does not return the Talent upgrading resources you used.

6. When a hero with activated Talents is used as advancement fodder, the Talent upgrading resources you used are returned accordingly.
help.story_033: Talents are gifts from the goddess. It's a mark left by the goddess on every soul, allowing those who crave strength to ascend to a higher realm. Refine your soul, unlock your potential, and acquire your very own legendary talents.
help.rule_034:
1. Any Relic that has been enhanced can be reborn.

2. After rebirth, the Relic maintains the same stars, but all enhancement progress reverts to 0 and 100% of all resources spent on enhancement are returned.
help.story_034:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The origin of Flashback Tower resulted from an accident. Several members of the Mage Guild accidentally opened up a connection between time and space during one of their experiments.
   They soon discovered that time here flowed in the opposite direction from the outside world and this area allowed matter to be reduced to its most fundamental state.
   Therefore the Magic Institute transformed this place into a clock tower to carry out in-depth research of mysterious temporal magic.
help.rule_035:
1. Advanced Summons cost Summon Ticket II.

2. Advanced Summons will randomly summon 3 to 5-star Heroes.

3. You're guaranteed to get at least one Legendary hero within 60 summons.
help.story_035:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The Hall of Heroes is the most lively and bustling place in the Imperial City. It is also the gathering place for heroes from all over the land.
   As the world-ending crisis draws near, ceaseless streams of warriors arrive in the city. They are ambitious and prideful, all trying to find their own team and create new legends.
help.rule_036:
1. Enhancement Level cannot exceed 2x the Player Level.

2. Quick Enhance can enhance up to 10 levels at a time.

3. Every 4 pieces of Gear upgraded by 10 Enhancement Levels will increase Gear Enhancement Mastery Level and grant Stat bonuses.
help.story_036: <color=#c05100>   </color>Various materials are used to craft Gear. Iron, copper, alloy, some kind of unknown ore, hard monster bones and teeth... In any case, Gear will be your most reliable aid when facing the enemy.
help.rule_037:
1. Each Refinement can grant stat bonuses.

2. Upgrading to the specified Refinement Level unlocks the corresponding Gear Tech.

3. Every 4 pieces of gear upgraded by 1 Refinement Level will increase Gear Refinement Mastery Level and grant additional stats.
help.story_037: <color=#c05100>   </color>Various materials are used to craft Gear. Iron, copper, alloy, some kind of unknown ore, hard monster bones and teeth... In any case, Gear will be your most reliable aid when facing the enemy.
help.rule_038:
1. Gear enchantment can raise stats.

2. When 4 pieces of Gear are raised to the same level, you can activate Enchantment Mastery and receive huge gains.

3. Lucky Strike: There is a chance to trigger Lucky Strike. When triggered, you only spend the resources required for one node and directly reach the node before a major node.
help.story_038: <color=#c05100>   </color>Various materials are used to craft Gear. Iron, copper, alloy, some kind of unknown ore, hard monster bones and teeth... In any case, Gear will be your most reliable aid when facing the enemy.
help.rule_039:
1. Spend Promotion Badges to promote your Legendary Gear for a great growth boost.

2. Team level requirements must be met before promotion.
help.story_039: <color=#c05100>   </color>Various materials are used to craft Gear. Iron, copper, alloy, some kind of unknown ore, hard monster bones and teeth... In any case, Gear will be your most reliable aid when facing the enemy.
help.rule_040:
1. The event lasts for 7 days. New trials and supply stores unlock at 00:00 game time each day.

2. All unfinished quests will expire after the event. You can continue to buy supplies and claim the rewards you have already earned.

3. The event interface and portal close 1 day after the event ends.
help.story_040:
<color=#c05100>   </color>Elune has noticed your heroic deeds, and she believes that you will be the key to saving the world.
   If you can pass her trial, the great Valor Valkyrie will become your ally and be a great help to you.
help.rule_041:
1. Each tier of the Valkyric Guardianship corresponds to multiple quests. Complete all quests to level up and claim rewards.

2. Attempts to claim Daily Rewards refresh daily at midnight.
help.story_041:
<color=#c05100>   </color>When the Omniguardian comes in contact with Valkyries, their Valkyric Guardianship is awakened and they are able to hear the guidance of the Mother Goddess. The Valkyrie Pact uses all of its remaining power to guide the Omniguardian in enhancing their Valkyric Guardianship.
    Following the Pact's guidance and completing the Goddess' quests, the Omniguardian can enhance their Valkyric Guardianship and obtain great rewards.
    The Omniguardian will ultimately unlock their full potential and gain complete control of the Valkyric Guardianship, allowing them to fulfill their purpose of saving the world.
help.rule_042:
1. Heroes can activate Rune Synergies and Rune Skills when they equip Runes:
Rune Synergy Activation: Equip 4 Runes of Epic or higher quality and advance the hero to 8-Star or higher.
Rune Skill Activation: Equip 4 Runes of Rare or higher quality to unlock the Counter Skill. Equip 4 Hero-exclusive Runes of Epic quality to unlock Rune Skill I. Equip 2 Hero-exclusive Runes of Legendary and 2 Epic quality to unlock Rune Skill II. Equip 4 Hero-exclusive Runes of Legendary quality to unlock Rune Skill III.

2. Epic or higher-quality Runes have a chance to become the Hero-exclusive Runes. Legendary Runes are guaranteed to become the Hero-exclusive Runes.

3. Equip 2 or 4 Runes of the same type to activate the Rune Set effects.

4. When equipping Runes of the same type but of different quality, the Set effects will be calculated based on the lowest quality of the Rune set.
help.story_042:
<color=#c05100>   </color>Once the Elite Enemies in a Celestial Trial have been defeated, the vestiges of their souls will coalesce into Runes.
   Runes can bless the souls of corresponding heroes, granting them unprecedented power and greatly enhancing their abilities.
help.rule_043:
1. Enhance runes with Rune Stones to boost their stats.

2. The higher the quality of the rune, the more enhancement stats it will gain.

3. With a higher rune quality, the maximum enhancement level increases.
help.story_043:
<color=#c05100>   </color>Once the Elite Enemies in a Celestial Trial have been defeated, the vestiges of their souls will coalesce into Runes.
   Runes can bless the souls of corresponding heroes, granting them unprecedented power and greatly enhancing their abilities.
help.rule_044:
1. Evolve your Epic exclusive runes to Legendary quality using Evolution Ore to significantly enhance their stats.

2. Only runes of Epic quality with exclusive hero effects can undergo the evolution process.

3. Certain heroes, like Empire, Woodland, and Eclipse heroes, require E/W/E Evolution Ores, and Divine and Demon heroes require D/D Evolution Ores. The upgrade process is divided into four parts, corresponding to different rune slots.

4. After a successful evolution, the rune's base stats and enhanced stats can be raised to Legendary quality. The exclusive hero effects remain unchanged, and the set effects are elevated to the Legendary quality. The individual effects of the rune remain the same. If the evolved rune doesn't have individual effects, a random Epic quality effect will be added.
help.story_044:
<color=#c05100>   </color>Once the Elite Enemies in a Celestial Trial have been defeated, the vestiges of their souls will coalesce into Runes.
   Runes can bless the souls of corresponding heroes, granting them unprecedented power and greatly enhancing their abilities.
help.rule_045:
1. Purchase Diamond packs of different values at the Diamond Shop.

2. Obtain Double Diamonds for your first purchase of a Diamond pack at each grade.

3. You can obtain VIP EXP through recharging and by completing certain achievement quests.

4. VIP EXP is used to increase VIP levels, which unlocks more privileges and exclusive packs.

5. The Oath Crystal can be used instead of recharging. Purchasing Oath Crystals does not grant VIP EXP, but using them does.
help.story_045:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The City Market is one of the most bustling places in the Imperial City, the capital. An endless stream of merchants from all over the world transports their best goods here to trade. Anyone can purchase their desired goods, be they ordinary townsfolk, or even the nobility.
   Naturally, this includes Omniguardians embarking on their journeys. They can purchase any items that they might need in battle here so that they can defeat tough elite enemies.
help.rule_046:
1. The first five heroes you obtain will automatically become Contracted Heroes, which you can change freely later.
2. The Hero Benediction Effects are determined by the lowest levels and ascension levels of the five Contracted Heroes. The Gear Benediction Effects are determined by the lowest quality, enhancement, refinement, enchantment, and promotion values of the gear equipped by the five Contracted Heroes.
3. Contracted Heroes cannot be used as materials for Hero Advancements.
4. Newly obtained heroes will automatically become Benedicted Heroes, gaining both the Hero Benediction and Gear Benediction Effects from the Contracted Heroes. Any duplicate heroes obtained later will become Material Heroes.
5. Duplicate Contracted and Benedicted Heroes are treated as Material Heroes, which cannot be upgraded or deployed.
help.story_046:
<color=#c05100>   </color>A sanctuary filled with a mysterious aura, built by the Imperial City to worship Goddess Eve of the old faith.
   In legends, Eve was the Creator Goddess and one of the few gods willing to approach humans. In times of war, She descended, unwilling to watch the demons' violence. Her protection of innocents led to Her reverence.
   The Goddess is well versed in all ceremonies and enters Contracts with heroes who go to the Labyrinth, blessing those who seek Her aid with power and revelation.
help.rule_047:
1. When Legendary heroes are advanced to 6-12 stars, the Revelation Achievements will be activated.
2. Complete the Revelation Achievements to get bonus stats.
3. When Legendary heroes are advanced to 11-12 stars, the Revelation Achievements will give percentage bonus stats.
help.story_047:
<color=#c05100>   </color>A sanctuary filled with a mysterious aura, built by the Imperial City to worship Goddess Eve of the old faith.
   In legends, Eve was the Creator Goddess and one of the few gods willing to approach humans. In times of war, She descended, unwilling to watch the demons' violence. Her protection of innocents led to Her reverence.
   The Goddess is well versed in all ceremonies and enters Contracts with heroes who go to the Labyrinth, blessing those who seek Her aid with power and revelation.
help.rule_048:
1. You can preview the new functions that will be unlocked in the future in the Adventure Guide.

2. The new functions in the Adventure Guide will have several Exploration Quests that can be completed after the function is unlocked.

3. Complete all the exploration quests to claim rewards. Rewards can only be claimed once.
help.story_048:
<color=#c05100>   </color>After the Demons were repelled, countless Omniguardians from all over the world rushed here, preparing to resist the evil forces and fight for freedom and glory.
   In order to help these arriving Omniguardians, the Empire Guild specially made this Adventure Guide. Omniguardians can verify the objectives that they need to achieve via this Guide. Furthermore, they will be able to claim generous rewards after completing these objectives.
help.rule_049:
1. Receive Star rewards based on how well you complete requirements when clearing stages.

2. Claim Chapter Star rewards when you earn the specified number of Stars in each chapter.

3. Proceed to the next chapter by clearing all stages in the current chapter and completing the stated requirements for the next chapter.

4. After unlocking this mode, chapters will be unlocked in order according to the server time.
help.story_049:
<color=#c05100>   </color>In ancient times, Imperials, Woodlanders and Eclipsers worked together to build a suspended city hanging above the ocean in order to avoid the turmoil of war. Then they used magic crystals to stabilize the city and built connections between the city and many superficial cities.
   Hundreds of years later, after detecting the scent of the magic crystals, the Demon army invaded. After defeating warriors of the three factions, they corroded the crystals to take control of the city and severed the connections to other cities.
help.rule_051:
1. Clear specific Mission chapters to obtain the corresponding rewards.

2. Obtain even greater rewards after you unlock the Mission Fund.
help.story_051: The mysterious objects that hold a part of the Supreme Will are known as "Decrees." Scholars in Mirlon have decoded the infinite secrets contained within these items and found that by meeting certain conditions, one can receive rewards from the Supreme Will. These conditions mainly involve defending against the Abyss invasion and enhancing oneself, precisely what the Omniguardians are doing. Even though the Supreme One has vanished, its influence on the world remains.
help.rule_052:
1. Clear specific Palace of Penrose floors to obtain the corresponding rewards.

2. Obtain even greater rewards after you unlock the Palace Fund.
help.rule_053:
1. Advanced Summon Decree unlocks on the 15th day after the current server opens.

2. The Advanced Summon Decree event lasts 28 days.

3. Earn Decree Points and get rewards by reaching certain Daily or Weekly Activity levels during the event.

4. When the Advanced Summon Decree resets, all unclaimed rewards will be issued by mail.

5. Unlock the Advanced Summon Decree to earn greater rewards. Players who buy the Advanced Summon Decree but cannot claim all rewards 4 days before reset may buy Decree Points with Diamonds.

6. The Advanced Summon Decree is valid only during the period it's unlocked and is not permanent.
help.rule_054:
1. Relic Summon Decree unlocks on the 8th day after the current server opens.

2. The Relic Summon Decree event lasts 28 days.

3. Earn Decree Points and get rewards by defeating certain monsters in the labyrinth during the event.

4. When Relic Summon Decree resets, all unclaimed rewards will be issued by mail.

5. Unlock the Relic Summon Decree to earn greater rewards. Players who buy the Relic Summon Decree but are unable to claim all rewards 4 days before reset may choose to buy Decree Points with Diamonds.

6. The Relic Summon Decree is valid only during the period it's unlocked and is not permanent.
help.rule_056:
1. The event lasts for 7 days. New trials and supply stores unlock at 00:00 game time each day.

2. All unfinished quests will expire after the event. You can continue to buy supplies and claim the rewards you have already earned.

3. The event interface and portal close 1 day after the event ends.
help.story_056:
<color=#c05100>   </color>Upon completing Elune's trial, Dorabella brings you to an ancient terra where a legendary harp lies sealed. It possesses powerful magic and is said to play exquisite sounds.
   Elune hopes you would complete the trial with her to unseal the relic. It would help with the adventures ahead.
help.rule_055:
1. Packs refresh at 00:00 daily.

2. Purchasing any pack will grant you points.

3.Upon reaching the specified amount of points, you can claim the corresponding rewards. Once the final points reward is claimed, the corresponding quantity of bonus points will be deducted, and all the points rewards will be reset.

4. Point items will be permanently retained if not used. If you don't want to redeem any heroes this time, you can wait and use them during the next hero rotation.

5. Heroes are rotated every four weeks. Please pay attention to the changes in each rotation to avoid missing out on any one of them.
help.story_055:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The City Market is one of the most bustling places in the Imperial City, the capital. An endless stream of merchants from all over the world transports their best goods here to trade. Anyone can purchase their desired goods, be they ordinary townsfolk, or even the nobility.
   Naturally, this includes Omniguardians embarking on their journeys. They can purchase any items that they might need in battle here so that they can defeat tough elite enemies.
help.help.rule_058:
1. Limited-Time Summons are unlocked after players clear Mission Chapter 3 and the server has been active for more than 14 days.

2. Limited-Time Summons include releases of both new and recurring heroes. Players can use Event Summon Tickets to summon after choosing the hero card pool they wish to summon from.

3. Each hero card pool's summon guarantee count is independent of other card pools and will be reset when the event ends.
help.help.rule_059:
1. Limited-Time Summons are unlocked after players clear Mission Chapter 3 and the server has been active for more than 14 days.

2. The Event Hall includes Limited-Time Summons, Hero Training, the Event Trial, and the Event Shop.

3. Complete Hero Training and Event Trial quests during the event to claim generous rewards.

4. During the event, Event Points can be used to redeem many valuable resources from the Event Shop.
help.help.rule_060:
1. During the event, advance specified heroes to a certain number of Stars to receive generous rewards.

2. After the event, any unclaimed rewards will be issued via mail.
help.help.rule_061:
1. Complete activity quests during the event to earn generous rewards.

2. Activity quests will reset during the event and can be completed multiple times to earn rewards more than once.

3. Access to the event will no longer be available when the event ends. Please be sure to complete the quests and claim your rewards in time.
help.help.rule_062:
1. Complete achievement quests during the event to earn generous rewards.

2. During the event, achievement quests can only be completed once and their rewards can only be claimed once as well.

3. Access to the event will no longer be available when the event ends. Please be sure to complete the quests and claim your rewards in time.
help.help.rule_063:
1. Use points to redeem valuable resources during the event.

2. Access to the event will no longer be available when the event ends. Please be sure to use your points in time. After the event, unused points will be converted into Gold.
help.help.rule_064:
1. You can buy Event Summon Ticket Packs during the event.

2. Unused Event Summon Tickets can be retained and used in future events.
help.story_057: A palace gifted to the Valkyries by Mother Goddess. It is the dream home for the Valkyries where they can live in peace.
help.rule_057:
1. Players can unlock the Valkyrie Manor after clearing Mission 1-7.

 2. Once it is unlocked, players will meet Valkyries here who need help.

 3. Players can rescue Valkyries from the Demons after clearing specified Mission stages.

 4. Increase the Favor of activated Valkyries by interacting with them or bringing them gifts.

 5. Increase a Valkyrie's Favor to unlock her skins, voicelines, stories, and more. Finish the stories to earn rewards.

 6. The total Favor from all Valkyries will increase the Manor's Level equally. A higher level grants all player's heroes higher stat bonuses.
help.rule_065:
The Arena provides many types of battle modes:

Arena: Battle against players in the same server as you to obtain points and increase your stage.

Yggdrasil Supremacy: Battle against players from different servers and climb to the highest stage in order to gain the greatest glory.
help.story_066: In the center of the universe beyond this planet grows a huge tree. Named the Yggdrasil by the Original Rulers, legend has it that this enormous tree nourishes itself on the power of the entire universe. There are five worlds atop the Yggdrasil. According to legend, anyone able to defeat all of the enemies within these five worlds will be able to obtain the fruit bore by the Yggdrasil—the Nihility Fruit—which possesses unlimited power. As a result, elite warriors from countless worlds travel to this site to engage in intense matches within the five worlds.
help.rule_067:
1. Info of the top 100 players from the previous season is recorded in the Hall of Fame.

2. Earn rewards by giving Likes to the top 3 players.
help.rule_066:
1. Season results for Yggdrasil Supremacy will be tallied every week.

2. 2 teams will engage in battles in Yggdrasil Supremacy. The player with 2 victories will be declared the winner. If 2 teams have 1 victory and 1 defeat, then the defeated teams on both sides will fight a 3rd battle. Each battle is limited to 15 rounds. If the winner is not determined by then, the team with the higher remaining HP percentage compared to the initial total HP wins.

3. There are 9 Coliseums in the Yggdrasil. After registering, players will battle each other in Helheim I Coliseum. Players may enter the next stage once they have been promoted.

4. Each Coliseum is divided into groups, each comprising 10 players. Players within each group will battle each other. High-ranking players will be promoted to the next Coliseum, while low-ranking players will be demoted to the previous Coliseum.

5. Once players are promoted to Asgard Coliseum, they will no longer be divided into groups. Instead, all players will battle against each other for the top ranks.

6. At the beginning of a new season, players will start in a lower Coliseum, descending a few Coliseums from their rank at the end of the previous season.

7. Players cannot be promoted to Asgard on the season's final day.

8. Competition Time:
Players can battle between 00:00 and 21:00 daily, with the tally beginning at 21:00. Players will be promoted/demoted according to these results. Players need to obtain 9 Insignias to be promoted.
The tally will occur from 21:00 to 21:30. During this time, no Coliseums can be entered.
Preparation occurs from 21:31 to 23:59 daily. During this time, players may enter a Coliseum but cannot challenge any opponents.

9. The season tally will occur at 21:00 every Sunday. Rewards will be distributed to players based on their stages. Players who rank in the top 100 will receive additional ranking rewards.
help.rule_058:
1. Limited-Time Summons are unlocked after players clear Mission Chapter 3 and the server has been active for more than 14 days.

2. Limited-Time Summons include releases of both new and recurring heroes. Players can use Special Summon Tickets to summon after choosing the hero pool they wish to summon from.

3. Each hero pool's summon guarantee count is independent of other hero pools and will be reset when the event ends.
help.rule_059:
1. Limited-Time Summons are unlocked after players clear Mission Chapter 3 and the server has been active for more than 14 days.

2. The Event Hall includes Limited-Time Summons, Hero Training, the Event Trial, and the Event Shop.

3. Complete Hero Training and Event Trial quests during the event to claim generous rewards.

4. During the event, Event Points can be used to redeem many valuable resources from the Event Shop.
help.rule_060:
1. During the event, advance specified heroes to a certain number of Stars to receive generous rewards.

2. After the event, any unclaimed rewards will be issued via mail.
help.rule_061:
1. Complete activity quests during the event to earn generous rewards.

2. Activity quests will reset during the event and can be completed multiple times to earn rewards more than once.

3. Access to the event will no longer be available when the event ends. Please be sure to complete the quests and claim your rewards in time.
help.rule_062:
1. Complete achievement quests during the event to earn generous rewards.

2. During the event, achievement quests can only be completed once and their rewards can only be claimed once as well.

3. Access to the event will no longer be available when the event ends. Please be sure to complete the quests and claim your rewards in time.
help.rule_063:
1. Use points to redeem valuable resources during the event.

2. Access to the event will no longer be available when the event ends. Please be sure to use your points in time. After the event, unused points will be converted into Gold.
help.rule_064:
1. You can buy Special Summon Ticket packs during the event.

2. Unused Special Summon Tickets can be retained and used in future events.
help.rule_068:
1. Complete quests to obtain point rewards. When your points reach specific values, you'll receive free rewards.

2. The final reward will only last until the 30th day after the server opens. After the 30th day, the final reward will be replaced with diamonds.

3. Certain quest tabs require specific features to be unlocked. However, progress will still be recorded normally.
help.rule_069:
1. The Diamond Decree unlocks on the 22nd day after the current server opens.

2. The Diamond Decree event lasts 28 days.

3. Earn Login Points and get rewards when you reach certain amounts of points during the event.

4. When the Diamond Decree resets, all unclaimed rewards will be issued by Mail.
help.rule_070:
1. The Oracle Summon Decree unlocks on the 10th day after the current server opens.

2. The Oracle Summon Decree event lasts 28 days.

3. Earn Celestial Trial Points and get rewards when you reach certain amounts of points during the event. Get points upon clearing or sweeping the challenge. There is a limit to the number of Celestial Trial Points that can be earned each day.

4. When the Oracle Summon Decree resets, all unclaimed rewards will be issued by mail.

5. Unlock the Oracle Summon Decree to earn greater rewards. Players who bought the Oracle Summon Decree can purchase Celestial Trial Points with Diamonds if they have not received all the rewards 4 days before the reset.

6. The Oracle Summon Decree is valid only during the period it's unlocked and is not permanent.
help.story_069:
1. The Diamond Decree unlocks on the 22nd day after the current server opens.

2. The Diamond Decree event lasts 28 days.

3. Earn Login Points and get rewards when you reach certain amounts of points during the event.

4. When Diamond Decree resets, all unclaimed rewards will be issued by Mail.
help.story_070:
1. The Oracle Summon Decree unlocks on the 10th day after the current server launches.

2. The Oracle Summon Decree event lasts 28 days.

3. You will get rewards when reaching specific amounts of Celestial Trial Points during the event. You can earn points by clearing or sweeping challenges. There is a limit to the number of Celestial Trial Points that can be earned each day.

4. When the Oracle Summon Decree resets, all unclaimed rewards will be issued by mail.

5. Unlock the Oracle Summon Advanced Decree to earn better rewards. Players who bought the Advanced Decree can purchase Celestial Trial Points with Diamonds if they have not received all the rewards 4 days before the reset.

6. The Advanced Decree is valid only during the period it's unlocked and is not permanent.
help.rule_073:
1. During the event, recharge a specific amount each day to earn 1 draw.

2. When all the prizes have been drawn, the prize pool will reset and the next round of draws will restart.
help.story_073: The Wishing Pool is a symbol of luck and love. It's said that the spring water is the blessed by the Holy Goddess. Simply toss a coin into the spring to make three wishes. You'll receive the Goddess's Benediction, Legendary Treasures, and remembrance of an eternal love.
help.story_068: As night falls, the goddesses invite you into dreamland. In the illusory and enchanting dream, Aiushtha promises to grant you the sweetest dream and the blessings of a miracle that can help you on your adventure when you complete her trial.
help.rule_077:
1. Log in for a specified number of days during the event to receive generous rewards.

2. After the event, all unclaimed rewards will be issued via mail.

3. Logging in during the reward distribution period will not count toward the total number of days logged in.
help.rule_079:
1. During the event, complete quests to obtain Puzzle Pieces.

2. Spend Puzzle Pieces to flip open puzzle grids. Obtain a reward for every completed row/column. Complete the entire puzzle to claim the grand prize.

3. You may claim puzzle rewards during the reward distribution period, but you will no longer be able to flip open puzzle grids.
help.rule_080:
1. Mythic Stone II can be purchased during the event.

2. Unused Mythic Stone II can be retained and used in future events.

3. Purchase is no longer allowed during the reward distribution period.
help.rule_074:
1. Spend Mythic Stone II to forge selectable Legendary Relics.

2. Selectable Legendary Relics can be changed anytime during the event period.

3. Mythic Stone II can be retained forever and used in future events. Other event items will be reset when the event ends.
help.story_074:
1. Chaos and disaster descend upon the world, causing unrest to reach even the core of the earth. The creator of ancient Relics, the Valkyrie Hestia, awakens from her slumber.

2. Gather the lost Mythic Stones from across the lands and toss them into the boiling furnace.

3. Hestia will forge ancient Relics for you, once again showcasing their boundless power.
help.rule_075:
1. During the event, perform a certain number of forges with Mythic Stone II to receive generous rewards.

2. After the event, all unclaimed rewards will be issued via Mail.
help.rule_076:
1. Spend Mythic Stone II to forge selectable Legendary Relics.

2. Selectable Legendary Relics can be changed anytime during the event period.

3. Mythic Stone II can be retained forever and used in future events. Other event items will be reset when the event ends.

4. Relics cannot be forged during the reward distribution period.
help.rule_078:
1. Use Forge Crystals to exchange for valuable resources during the event.

2. Access to the event will no longer be available when the event ends. Please be sure to use your Forge Crystals in time. After the event, unused points will be converted into Gold.

3. You may still exchange resources during the reward distribution period.
help.rule_081: Purchase Packs to earn Synergy Summon Tickets and summon Legendary heroes with specific Synergies.
help.story_081:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The Hall of Heroes is the most lively and bustling place in the Imperial City. It is also the gathering place for heroes from all over the land.
   As the world-ending crisis draws near, ceaseless streams of warriors arrive in the city. They are ambitious and prideful, all trying to find their own team and create new legends.
help.rule_082:
1. Synergy Summon can be performed by spending Synergy Summon Tickets.

2. Each Synergy Summon will randomly summon 3- to 5-Star Hero(es).

3. Within 50 summons, you are guaranteed a legendary hero of the selected synergy, with a 50% chance for it to be the wishlisted hero.

4. If the two consecutive legendary heroes you summon are not wishlisted, the third legendary hero will be the wishlisted one.

5. The 6 Synergy Pools share the same guarantee count, and you can switch between them at any time.
help.story_082:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The Hall of Heroes is the most lively and bustling place in the Imperial City. It is also the gathering place for heroes from all over the land.
   As the world-ending crisis draws near, ceaseless streams of warriors arrive in the city. They are ambitious and prideful, all trying to find their own team and create new legends.
help.rule_083:
1. Common Summons cost SMN Ticket I.

2. Common Summons will randomly summon 2 to 5-Star Heroes.

3. Common Summons have a chance to summon Legendary Heroes.
help.story_083:
<color=#c05100>   </color>The Hall of Heroes is the most lively and bustling place in the Imperial City. It is also the gathering place for heroes from all over the land.
   As the world-ending crisis draws near, ceaseless streams of warriors arrive in the city. They are ambitious and prideful, all trying to find their own team and create new legends.
help.rule_071:
1. In the Abyss Demons event, players can use exclusive summoning tickets for Immortal Summons to randomly get Divine or Demon heroes.

2. Players can keep using Immortal Summons for a chance to trigger the Super Chance state. Under this state, the chances of summoning Legendary heroes are significantly increased, and the chances of obtaining heroes in the event are also greatly increased.

3. The Super Chance is only effective for the next 10 consecutive summons and is only valid for 15 minutes, and will automatically disappear after it expires.

4. Reach a specified number of Immortal Summons to receive a reward.
help.story_071: No one knows where the edge of the mainland is nor how deep the Abyss beneath the mainland goes. Could there be the bottom of the Demons' lair or a hellish realm of slaughter?
help.rule_072:
1. In the Divine Realm event, players can use exclusive summoning tickets for Immortal Summons to randomly get Divine or Demon heroes.

2. Players can keep using Immortal Summons for a chance to trigger the Super Chance state. Under this state, the chances of summoning Legendary heroes are significantly increased, and the chances of obtaining heroes in the event are also greatly increased.

3. The Super Chance is only effective for the next 10 consecutive summons and is only valid for 15 minutes, and will automatically disappear after it expires.

4. Reach a specified number of Immortal Summons to receive a reward.
help.story_072: Legends has it that gods reside on the highest sacred mountain in the Mainland. To seek their blessings, one has to be a persistent traveler and a devout believer.
help.rule_084:
1. You can idle for up to 24 hours initially. Leveling up will increase your max idle duration.

2. Increasing your VIP level grants additional idle efficiency bonuses.
help.rule_085:
1. Diamonds can be used to purchase idle speed-ups, which grants 12 hours worth of idle rewards each time.

2. Idle Speed-up can be purchased every day for each instance. The Idle Speed-up attempts available daily increases alongside your VIP level.

3. You can idle for up to 24 hours initially. Leveling up will increase your max idle duration.

4. VIP idle efficiency bonuses also apply to idle speed-ups.
help.story_065: There is always competition between the strongest among us. Victories and failures will not determine your fate, though they are bound to come with honor or shame. Heroes from all over the world, strive for the crown—the pinnacle of strength!
help.rule_086:
1. Spend some items to donate to the Guild to obtain great rewards.

2. When the total Guild Donation Progress reaches a certain milestone, each guild member will receive 1 reward.

3. Every member has 3 chances to donate per day.
help.story_086: On the mainland, guilds are a symbol of power beyond individuals. The famous guilds among them are made up of powerful adventurers who are excellent in magic and swordsmanship and take it as their duty to protect humanity. As the battles escalated, the wealth of these guilds began to accumulate. The guild members decided to encourage more people to participate in the family through a sign-up donation system.
help.rule_088:
1. During the event period, complete the series of quests to receive the corresponding rewards

2. The event will have multiple rounds, and the next round of quests can only be unlocked after completing the previous round.

3. The activities are reset from time to time.
help.story_088: Super rebate! Summon to your heart's content, only for a limited time!
help.rule_089:
1. After leveling up the Manor, you can unlock the collection room and get the collectibles presented by the Valkyrie.

2. Collectibles can boost Idle resource rewards and Daily/Weekly Quest Chest rewards.

3. Different collectibles can provide different kinds of resource reward bonuses. Increasing the Manor's level will improve the quality of the collectibles and the number of reward bonuses.
help.story_089: The Collection Room in the Manor will help you increase the Valkyrie Favor, and they will give you an exclusive collectible for safekeeping.
help.rule_090:
1. Northern Expedition yields lots of Diamonds and SMN Tickets I.

2. Northern Expedition has 3 difficulty levels, each with 100 stages. You need to clear one difficulty level to access the next.

3. You will get a clearance reward for clearing every <color=#c05100>5</color> stages. You will get a bigger reward for clearing every 100 stages.

4. Each season of Northern Expedition lasts for 1 month. Once the portal to Northern Expedition is available, this server will join the ongoing season.

5. Players' power and stats are recalculated in this mode. See the rules on stat balance for details.
help.story_090: The North was a fertile land until the arrival of a former Valkyrie. A devil's curse befell her, causing her power to spiral out of control. She fled here with a tremendous amount of cold air, transforming everything in her wake into a frozen wasteland. What secrets lie buried beneath the ice and snow? What horrors await the brave warriors who dare to venture into the North? Join the Northern Expedition and find out!
help.rule_091:
1. Rift Odyssey yields lots of Diamonds and SMN Tickets II.

2. Rift Odyssey has many difficulty levels. You need to clear one difficulty level to access the next.

3. You will get a clearance reward for clearing every <color=#c05100>5</color> stages. You will get a bigger reward for clearing every 25 stages.

4. A new round consists of 4 weeks for the Rift Odyssey. When the entrance to the Rift Odyssey is open on the current server, it will join the ongoing round.

5. Players' Power and stats are recalculated in this mode. See the rules on stat balance for details.
help.rule_087:
1. When Heroes reach certain stars or have specific Synergies unlocked, you can activate their Archives.

2. The stat bonus granted by Archives is permanent, even if the Hero is discarded.
help.rule_092:
1. In this mode, deployed Heroes' stats and Power are determined by their stars, regardless of their existing upgrades.

2. Heroes' skill levels, Synergy activation status, Talent skills, and Rune skills remain the same.

3. Relic skill levels remain the same too.

4. A good lineup combined with Synergies is the key to victory.
help.story_092: Where the gods bear witness to Hero Conversion.
help.story_091: In the past, the Shattered Realm was not as cold. It was rich in resources, and life thrived. However, during the Era of Calamity, a Divine War erupted between the Supreme Will and the Malevolent Mother behind the Abyss. Though the Supreme Will emerged victorious, Itheron, situated high in the treetops, along with Mirlond, plunged into the Prime Roots. The fragments of the land floated above the roots, forming various shattered continents, each harboring unknown dangers.
help.rule_093:
1. When you have a Legendary hero at the maximum stars, their duplicates become excess heroes.

2. You can use 3 excess heroes for Hero Conversion.

3. Excess heroes used for Hero Conversion must all be Empire/Woodland/Eclipse or Divine/Demon heroes.
help.story_093: Where the gods bear witness to Hero Conversion.
help.rule_094:
1. The "Valkyrie's Bestowal" event will be unlocked after players complete Mission 3-15.

2. There are a total of 4 hero pools in the event, which will open on the 1st, 2nd, 4th, and 8th day. The event will end on the 9th day after the player creates their character.

3. After a hero pool is opened, players can use the corresponding event's Summon Tickets to perform hero summons. After the expiration, summoning will no longer be possible.

4. Each hero pool allows only 10 consecutive summons, with a high chance of obtaining Legendary heroes.

5. The results of 10 consecutive summons will be stored temporarily (the saved results will not be immediately claimed), and players can continue summoning. Eventually, when the number of summons reaches the hero pool limit, you can choose 1 summoning result to exchange. After the exchange, players will get the 10 heroes, and the rest of the unselected results will be converted into hero shards of different qualities accordingly.

6. Only after the completion of the exchange in the previously opened hero pool, players can proceed with summoning in the subsequent pool. So remember to exchange the heroes from each pool.

7. You will not be able to exchange heroes after the event ends, so make sure to check the event time carefully.
help.story_094: In the mythological legends, the 7 Valkyries are warriors sent by the Goddess to save the world. As a token of gratitude for your assistance, the Valkyries will come every day to offer generous rewards. Hurry and claim yours!
help.rule_095:
1. After the "Treasure Hunt" limited event starts, specific features will grant time-limited exclusive event items, which can be exchanged for generous rewards in the corresponding shop.

2. You can obtain Normal Shells through Vileflower Harvest, Grayshroom Realm, Idling in Missions, and Speed Up.

3. You can obtain Gold Shells through Terra Occupation, the Arena, and Celestial Trial sweeps.

4. During the event, the Treasure Shop will also become available. You can purchase exclusive packs to obtain Radiant Shells there.

5. The "Treasure Hunt" event will open periodically for a limited time. Unused event items will be kept and can still be used when the event starts again.
help.story_095: The Merchant's Ship has returned! Its hold is filled with precious treasures, shimmering with the endless light of mysterious wealth. Adventurers can exchange magical shells for precious treasures. Hurry and come aboard to take a look!
help.rule_096: The Hall of Fame records the top 3 guilds' information from past seasons.
help.rule_097:
1. After the feature is activated, players can claim a daily login reward upon logging in each day.

2. On the login day, if players recharge any amount, they can receive double the rewards for that day's sign-in.

3. By accumulating logins for a specified number of days, players can obtain additional hero rewards. These rewards cannot be doubled through recharging.
help.rule_098:
1. After you join a Guild, you can claim the Guild Chests given by your guildmates and earn random numbers of Diamonds from them.

2. Chests of different qualities contain different numbers of Diamonds. You can earn Guild Chests by completing Chest Quests or from the result tallying rewards of some game modes.

3. Each type of Guild Chest is only available for a limited number before a specific date. It will no longer be available when it is out of stock or when it has expired.

4. Each player can claim each Guild Chest only once, and each player can claim up to 30 Guild Chests per week.

5. After successfully completing the Main Mission 5-15 for the first time and claiming the Guild Donation Chest reward, you can obtain Friendship Flowers, which can be given back to the players who distributed the chests. When the chests have all been claimed or when they expired, the received Friendship Flowers will be converted at a 1:1 ratio into Blossom Coins, which can be used to exchange exclusive Avatar Frames in the Guild Shop.
help.story_098:
1. After you join a Guild, you can claim the Guild Chests given by your guildmates and earn random numbers of Diamonds from them.

2. Chests of different qualities contain different numbers of Diamonds. You can earn Guild Chests by completing Chest Quests or from the result tallying rewards of some game modes.

3. Each type of Guild Chest is only available for a limited number before a specific date. It will no longer be available when it is out of stock or when it has expired.

4. Each player can claim each Guild Chest only once, and each player can claim up to 30 Guild Chests per week.

5. After successfully completing the Main Mission 5-15 for the first time and claiming the Guild Donation Chest reward, you can obtain Friendship Flowers, which can be given back to the players who distributed the chests. When the chests have all been claimed or when they expired, the received Friendship Flowers will be converted at a 1:1 ratio into Blossom Coins, which can be used to exchange exclusive Avatar Frames in the Guild Shop.
help.story_099: After the Abyssal army retreated into the Endless Abyss, the three major factions joined forces to establish defenses on the precipices of the Abyss. They erected watchtowers, reinforcing the seal over the Abyss, always vigilant of the movements within its depths. However, this seal is not entirely secure. The Dark Guardians have nurtured numerous Abyss Lords in hopes of breaking the seal. Should they emerge, the newly constructed seal of the three factions will falter. Warriors must venture deep into the Abyss to vanquish the not-yet-matured Abyss Lords from time to time, initiating an expedition into the Abyss.
help.rule_099:
1. The Abyss Crusade is a periodic event lasting 7 days each period.

2. In this gameplay, hero levels will be unified to level 100.

3. Within the gameplay, hero stats are only related to the hero's star level. The higher the star level, the stronger the stats, regardless of other upgrades.

4. Skill effects are only related to the following:
Heroes: Skill effects correspond to hero star levels.
Relic: Skill effects corresponding to relic star levels.
Talents: Faction synergies and hero talent skills.
Runes: Rune synergies and hero rune skills.

5. The gameplay is divided into 3 difficulties. Different difficulties will set limits on hero star levels, relic star levels, talent levels, and rune qualities. When the upgrades exceed these limits, stats and skill effects will be determined based on the limits. When the upgrades fall short of the limits, stats and skill effects will be determined based on the actual upgrades. The specific limits corresponding to each difficulty are as follows:
Common Difficulty: Hero star level up to 7 stars, relic star level up to 2 stars, talent with uncommon quality, runes with uncommon quality.
Hard Difficulty: Hero star level up to 9 stars, relic star level up to 5 stars, talent with rare quality, runes with rare quality.
Nightmare Difficulty: Hero star level up to 15 stars, relic star level up to 10 stars, talent with epic quality, runes with legendary quality.

6. Each difficulty corresponds to different requirements for Valkyrie synergy scores. Players must choose one difficulty they qualify for to participate, and once selected, the current selection cannot be changed. Higher difficulties yield better rewards, but the competition is more intense.

7. Players of the same difficulty will be divided into rooms, each with 100 players.

8. During the event, you will receive a certain number of daily challenge attempts. When you have used up all your challenge attempts, you can use a Trial Ticket to continue challenging.

9. The higher the damage dealt to the boss, the higher the total damage points gained. The event ranks participants based on the total damage points dealt to the boss, categorizing them into room rankings and rankings within the same difficulty zone. When the event ends, rewards for rankings are distributed by mail

10.Furthermore, the top 128 players with the most outstanding performance in each Abyss Crusade phase will become Gladiators and participate in the next Foggy Colosseum. The Gladiators give preference to those who are in the top 128 in the Nightmare difficulty. If there are not enough participants, additional slots will be filled from the Hard difficulty category. If there is still a shortage, participants will be recruited from the Normal difficulty category. If there is still an insufficient number of participants, the next session of the Foggy Colosseum will be postponed. Since the season content begins on the 22nd day of the server, players are eligible to become Gladiators in each Abyss Crusade phase if their server has been open for at least 15 days; otherwise, replacements will be chosen from subsequent players.
help.rule_104:
There are various Abyss Crusade Rankings:

Zone DMG Score Rank: There are three difficulties: Common, Hard, and Nightmare. Players of each zone will be ranked based on their highest accumulated damage points in the crusade during this season. The top 200 players will be visible to all.

Room DMG Score Rank: Players of each room will be ranked based on their highest accumulated damage points in the crusade during this season.

Crusade Star: This shows the No.1 player of each Zone for each difficulty (Common, Hard, and Nightmare). Players on the same difficulty in the zone can admire them.

The more damage you deal to the Abyss Lords, the more damage points you will earn. Come fight for glory now!
help.story_104: To commend the Heroes who did well in the hard-fought battles against the Abyss Lords, the three factions worked together and set up the Abyss Crusade rankings for everyone to admire the greatest!
help.rule_105:
Each expedition season las for 4 weeks, with settlement taking place on the last day.

Players will be ranked based on their Expedition progress. If two players have reached the same stage, the player who reached that stage earlier ranks higher.

When the results are tallied, the top 100 players of each zone will be commended.
help.rule_94_2:
1. Round 2 of "Valkyrie's Bestowal" will be unlocked on the 12th day of character creation.

2. There are a total of 4 hero pools in the event, which will open on the 12th, 18th, 25th, and 32nd day. The event will end on the 33rd day after the player creates their character.

3. After a hero pool is opened, players can use the corresponding event's Summon Tickets to perform hero summons. After the expiration, summoning will no longer be possible.

4. Each hero pool allows only 10 consecutive summons, with a high chance of obtaining Legendary heroes.

5. The results of 10 consecutive summons will be stored temporarily (the saved results will not be immediately claimed), and players can continue summoning. Eventually, when the number of summons reaches the hero pool limit, you can choose 1 summoning result to exchange. After the exchange, players will get the 10 heroes, and the rest of the unselected results will be converted into hero shards of different qualities accordingly.

6. Only after the completion of the exchange in the previously opened hero pool, players can proceed with summoning in the subsequent pool. So remember to exchange the heroes from each pool.
