Eventually, when the number of summons reaches the hero pool limit, you can choose 1 summoning result to exchange. After the exchange, players will get the 10 heroes, and the rest of the unselected results will be converted into hero shards of different qualities accordingly.

6. Only after the completion of the exchange in the previously opened hero pool, players can proceed with summoning in the subsequent pool. So remember to exchange the heroes from each pool.

7. You will not be able to exchange heroes after the event ends, so make sure to check the event time carefully.
help.rule_94_8:
1. Round 8 of "Valkyrie's Bestowal" will be unlocked on the 439th day of character creation.

2. There are a total of 4 hero pools in the event, which will open on the 439th, 460th, 481th, and 502nd day. The event will end on the 503rd day after the player creates their character.

3. After a hero pool is opened, players can use the corresponding event's Summon Tickets to perform hero summons. After the expiration, summoning will no longer be possible.

4. Each hero pool allows only 10 consecutive summons, with a high chance of obtaining Legendary heroes.

5. The results of 10 consecutive summons will be stored temporarily (the saved results will not be immediately claimed), and players can continue summoning. Eventually, when the number of summons reaches the hero pool limit, you can choose 1 summoning result to exchange. After the exchange, players will get the 10 heroes, and the rest of the unselected results will be converted into hero shards of different qualities accordingly.

6. Only after the completion of the exchange in the previously opened hero pool, players can proceed with summoning in the subsequent pool. So remember to exchange the heroes from each pool.

7. You will not be able to exchange heroes after the event ends, so make sure to check the event time carefully.
help.rule_94_9:
1. Round 9 of "Valkyrie's Bestowal" will be unlocked on the 523th day of character creation.

2. There are a total of 4 hero pools in the event, which will open on the 523th, 544th, 565th, and 586th day. The event will end on the 587th day after the player creates their character.

3. After a hero pool is opened, players can use the corresponding event's Summon Tickets to perform hero summons. After the expiration, summoning will no longer be possible.

4. Each hero pool allows only 10 consecutive summons, with a high chance of obtaining Legendary heroes.

5. The results of 10 consecutive summons will be stored temporarily (the saved results will not be immediately claimed), and players can continue summoning. Eventually, when the number of summons reaches the hero pool limit, you can choose 1 summoning result to exchange. After the exchange, players will get the 10 heroes, and the rest of the unselected results will be converted into hero shards of different qualities accordingly.

6. Only after the completion of the exchange in the previously opened hero pool, players can proceed with summoning in the subsequent pool. So remember to exchange the heroes from each pool.

7. You will not be able to exchange heroes after the event ends, so make sure to check the event time carefully.
help.rule_294:
1. Guild members can receive insignias upon achieving specific accomplishments.

2. There are gold, silver, and bronze insignias for each type of merit, each offering different bonuses.

3. The effects of the top 5 highest-quality insignias for each type of merit will be active.

4. Insignias refresh daily at midnight, tracking the achievement progress of guild members from the previous day and issuing new insignias.

5. Members with active insignias can receive flowers daily, and the recipients will receive an equivalent amount of Blossom Coins.

6. Received flowers accumulate as a record of member contributions.

7. When a member leaves the guild, their insignias will no longer be active, and the total number of received flowers will be reset.
help.rule_27010:
<color=#c05100>[Basic Rules]</color>
1. In each round of Clash Domain, once specific conditions are met, Supremacy will open 5 times.
<color=#c05100>[Team Restrictions]</color>
1. Each time Supremacy opens, based on the current room tier, administrators can dispatch a certain number of teams to participate.
2. Each member can dispatch up to 2 teams.
3. The higher the room tier in Clash Domain, the more teams can be dispatched for Supremacy.
<color=#c05100>[Assistance Rules]</color>
1. Each time Supremacy opens, all members in the room will receive 3 Assistance chances, which can be used to cheer or boo other guilds.
2. Based on the Assistance type, the target guild will receive positive/negative effects during battle.
3. The Assistance count resets after the current round of Clash Domain ends.
<color=#c05100>[Supremacy Blessings]</color>
1. In each Supremacy battle, a random Supremacy Blessing will be generated. Heroes with the corresponding Season Synergy will receive additional stat bonuses during battle.
<color=#c05100>[Battle Rules]</color>
1. During the settlement phase, battles between guilds will be conducted based on the grid points ranking, until only one guild remains.
2. The winning streak of each team in battles is the same as that on other grids.
3. The team remaining until the end without any opponents is considered to have achieved 1 win.
<color=#c05100>[Ranking Rules]</color>
1. Based on the number of wins in Supremacy of each guild, the corresponding grid points will be obtained.
2. If the number of wins is the same, the guild with fewer grid points will rank higher.
help.story_27010: The towering fortress in the sky stands grand and majestic, a pinnacle of glory contested by various forces. On the battlefield, where blood and sweat intertwine, where shouts and the beating of drums weave into an exhilarating symphony, each clash resounds like thunder, shaking the hearts of all. The victorious cheers echo at the pinnacle of the battlefield, where glory and splendor belong to them. And for every team that battles in Supremacy, their resilience and unyielding spirit will forever be etched upon this land.
help.rule_295:
The Foggy Colosseum provides many types of battle modes:

Foggy Colosseum: The top 128 players in each Abyss Crusade Zone battle each other to determine the ultimate champion.

World Arena: Battle against players from different zones, earn points, and advance in tiers.
help.rule_296:
1. Each season consists of 2 rounds of World Arena matches, each lasting 14 days.

2. You get 5 free challenge attempts available every day, which can accumulate, and once the limit is reached, they will no longer increase.

3. Each challenge matches you with 3 opponents, from which you choose one to challenge. Winning earns points while losing deducts points.

4. Challenges are conducted in multiple rounds based on the opponent's tier:
Platinum IV and below: Best 2 out of 3.
Platinum IV to Master I: Best 3 out of 5.
Challenger V to Challenger II: Best 4 out of 7.
Challenger I and above: Best 5 out of 9

5. In battles from Diamond V tier and above, the opponent's defensive lineup order is randomized.

6. Attain the specified points requirement to advance in tiers. For Challenger IV and above tiers, there are ranking requirements in addition to points.

7. Depending on the tier achieved at the end of this round, there will be different initial tiers at the start of the next round.
help.story_296: In the sky, mysterious rifts appear, unveiling arenas accessible to all life forms within the void. The ultimate victor shall inherit ancient relics. Yet, behind this glory lie countless sacrifices of warriors. As night falls, starlight pierces through the fissures, prompting people to gaze at the heavens, envisioning the enigmatic arena and the valiant warriors within, their hearts filled with reverence and yearning. This arena has witnessed the birth of the mightiest warriors in the universe and the passing of countless lives; it stands as both a symbol of glory and a monument of tragic remembrance.
help.rule_123:
1. When the Guild Activity is too low, the Transfer Recommendation feature will be activated.

2. We will recommend active guilds that you can directly join.

3. You can directly transfer to another guild through the recommendation list. If you are the guild leader, the leadership will be automatically transferred to another guild member before your transfer.

4. When your guild becomes active again, the Transfer Recommendation feature will be automatically turned off.
help.rule_124:
1. Guilds that have been open for more than 7 days can use the Guild Merge feature, but only if the guild leader has been active for the past 7 days.

2. The following conditions must be met for a merger:
The total number of active members from the "merging guild" and the active members from the "merged guild" who are not currently on cooldown for joining the "merging guild" should not exceed the member limit of the "merging guild."
The leader of the "merged guild" must be able to join the "merging guild."

3. Each application has a validity period of 24 hours. Within this time frame, if the other guild does not reject the application, you cannot send another application to the same guild.

4. Upon approval of the application, the guild merger will take place immediately.
help.rule_27011:
<color=#c05100>[Basic Rules]</color>
1. After your guild joins Clash Domain, its Royal City will face attacks from monsters. Guild members need to work together to challenge these monsters and defend against their threats.
<color=#c05100>[Challenge Rules]</color>
1. Each season, upon entering Clash Domain for the first time, your guild will receive 10 challenge attempts. Subsequently, the guild will regain 1 challenge attempt every 2 hours.
2. Each time your guild challenges monsters, you will earn Artifact rewards. The higher the damage dealt, the better the rewards.
3. Challenge items will expire at the end of the season.
<color=#c05100>[First Kill Rewards]</color>
1. When each wave of monsters is completely defeated for the first time, a treasure chest will appear on the map. All guild members can claim rewards from it.
2. Guild members will be inspired, increasing the Morale of all teams in the current round.
<color=#c05100>[Phantom State]</color>
Before the countdown ends, if your guild defeats all the monsters, the monsters will enter a Phantom state:
1. They can still be challenged and refreshed, but they will not attack the Royal City.
2. The countdown will turn into a refresh timer. After it ends, a new wave of monsters will appear.
<color=#c05100>[Damaged State]</color>
When the countdown ends, if your guild fails to defeat all the monsters, the monsters will proceed to attack the Royal City:
1. The Royal City will enter a Damaged state, and Grid Points earned will be halved.
2. Guild members will be affected, reducing the Morale of all teams in the next round.
3. Successfully defeating all the monsters will lift the Damaged state of the Royal City.
help.story_27011: Monsters are gathering to plunder the Royal City amidst the chaos. Defeat them before they reach the city to ensure its safety!
help.rule_263:
Each time you synthesize or star-up an artifact, you earn artifact Gift EXP.

2. Collect artifact Gift EXP to increase your artifact donation level, gaining powerful bonuses and rewards.

3. During the season, rankings are based on accumulated artifact Gift EXP, which resets at the end of each season.
help.rule_264:
1. The Rune Decree will become available on the 28th day after the server opens.

2. The Rune Decree event lasts for 28 days.

3. During the event, you can earn rewards by accumulating login points.

4. When the Rune Decree resets, all the unclaimed rewards will be sent to you by in-game mail.
help.rule_265:
1. Spend Surprise Tickets to spin the fortune wheel and win great prizes.

2. There are three grand prizes on the wheel, and each prize can only be won once.

3. Each spin that doesn't win a grand prize will accumulate one point of Luck. When your Luck points bar is full, you're guaranteed to win the grand prize, and all luck points will reset.

4. The first time you enter the event each day, you can choose a cup of Valkyrie's cocktail. After drinking it, your next spin will receive the Valkyrie's blessing.

5. Complete lucky missions to earn Surprise Tickets.
help.story_265: The pointer spins, and the prizes keep coming, tonight, you are the lucky star!
help.rule_266: During the event, log in daily to receive a special gift from Themis. After logging in for 10 days, you can claim all rewards.
help.story_266: Join Themis for an exciting game of pool! Her gifts are already prepared for you.
help.rule_267:
1. The Anniversary Decree will start and end with the Euphoria Carnival.

2. The total duration of the Anniversary Decree event is 14 days.

3. Accumulate the specified number of Decree Points during the event period to receive corresponding rewards. You can also obtain points in the daily login event.

4. When the Anniversary Decree ends, all unclaimed rewards will be sent via email.

5. Unlocking the Advanced Anniversary Decree grants even more generous rewards. Players who purchase the paid Anniversary Decree can buy Decree Points with diamonds if they haven't claimed all rewards within 4 days before the reset.

6. The Anniversary Decree is only effective during the unlocked period and does not last permanently.
help.rule_126:
1. Each Dragon War will match your guild against another across different war zones.

2. Both guilds will challenge each other's dragons; the higher the dragon's level, the stronger its stats.

3. Progress is tracked by the damage inflicted during each challenge, with the total progress of all members determining the guild's overall progress.

4. The guild with the higher total progress wins the Dragon War.

5. Each challenge requires deploying multiple teams, with each team calculating damage and progress independently. The total progress for a challenge is the sum of all teams' progress.

6. The initial number of deployed teams is 2. You can unlock 1 additional team each by reaching 80000 and 12000 Valkyrie Synergy Archive Power respectively. You can also increase the number of available teams by activating the talents in the Hope Tree.

7. The higher the damage dealt in a single challenge, the better the rewards.

8. At the start of each Dragon War, you get 10 challenge attempts. These attempts can only be used for that specific Dragon War.

9. The Guild Leader, Captains, and Generals can use blessing skills to add more challenge attempts for all members. Members can also use Diamonds to purchase extra attempts, which are limited to that specific Dragon War.
help.story_127: Mighty dragons descend upon the battlefield! Challenge them, nurture them, and use their power to turn the tide of battle!
help.rule_127:
1. Spend energy to summon the guild's dragon. You can choose a grid occupied by an opponent and make it unclaimed.

2. Different grids require different amounts of energy to attack.

3. The summoned dragon will launch its attack during the current turn's settlement phase. Before this, you can withdraw or change the attack target.

4. You can only attack one grid per turn. The attacked grid cannot be attacked again for a set number of rounds.

5. If a team and dragon simultaneously attack a grid, the dragon will not continue the attack after the team's victory, though energy will still be consumed.
help.rule_125:
1. The guild has four dragon eggs, which will gradually hatch throughout the season.

2. After hatching, the dragonlings can be evolved by the guild leader into different forms as they reach certain levels.

3. The dragons' levels are tied to the level of the guild's Royal City.

4. Evolved dragons gain more powerful skills.

5. The dragons' skills are enhanced when they reach Lv.26 and Lv.31.

6. All dragons will participate in the Dragon Wars.
help.story_126: Mighty dragons descend upon the battlefield! Challenge them, nurture them, and use their power to turn the tide of battle!
help.rule_128:
1. Hero and Relic Top Rankings: Determined by the most popular heroes and relics in the current lineup rankings.

2.Lineup Top Rankings: Refreshed every 3 days, showcasing the most popular lineups across all servers.
help.rule_129:
The Champion Decree is active for a total of 14 days.

2.Earn Decree points during the event period to unlock rewards. Daily logins will grant points throughout the event.

3. When the Champion Decree ends, any unclaimed rewards will be sent via email.

4. Unlocking the Anniversary Decree provides more substantial rewards. Players who purchase the paid Champion Decree and have not claimed all rewards within 4 days of reset can use diamonds to purchase remaining decree points.

5. The Champion Decree is only active during its unlock period and does not last indefinitely.
help.rule_130:
1. Once the Guild Challenge begins, guild members can complete quests to earn guild points. Once personal points reach the specified threshold, rewards can be claimed. Guilds will compete for points against each other within the same zone.

2. All guild members who meet the requirements to unlock the feature can accept quests and earn guild points by fulfilling the corresponding conditions within a time limit.

3. Quests must be completed within 24 hours of acceptance; if not, they will be considered expired.

4. During the event, each member has 10 initial attempts to accept quests. Completing a quest or letting it expire will consume one attempt. Once all attempts are used up, members can spend Diamonds to purchase a limited number of additional attempts. Quests can be abandoned, and doing so will return the attempts.

5. Each quest can be accepted by a maximum of 3 members in the guild. Once the limit is reached, the quest cannot be accepted again. The quest will automatically refresh once all members who accepted it have either completed it or let it expire.

6. Each guild member can only accept one Guild Challenge quest at a time. After completing or letting it expire, they can accept the next one.

7. Quests come in different qualities. The higher the quality, the more points are earned upon completion. Any quest of the same quality will yield the same number of points.

8. The guild leader and captains can manually refresh quests that no members are currently executing. There is a limit to the number of refreshes per guild, and the refresh attempts are shared between the guild leader and captains. Refresh attempts reset daily.

9. If the number of members contributing points to the guild during the event exceeds the guild's maximum capacity, the guild points will be calculated based only on the highest points of members up to the member limit.
help.rule_131:
1. Once the Guild Challenge begins, guilds in the same zone will be ranked based on their guild points.

2. At the end of the event, all members of the guilds that rank high will receive rewards. Additionally, the top-ranking guilds will be awarded an exclusive, limited-time avatar frame.

3. To recognize the efforts of the guild leader and captains in managing the guild, additional rewards will be given to the leaders and captains of the eligible guilds.

4. Rank rewards will be calculated and distributed after the event concludes.
help.rule_132:
1. In the Event Calendar, you can view the main features and events scheduled for this week and next week.

2. Events and features are distinguished by different colors.
help.rule_299:
1. The more Valkyries you rescue, the more rewards you can claim.

2. Rescue all the Valkyries to claim the grand prize.

3. Completing the specified mission counts as a successful rescue.
help.story_299:
1. The more Valkyries you rescue, the more rewards you can claim.

2. Rescue all the Valkyries to claim the grand prize.

3. Completing the specified mission counts as a successful rescue.
help.rule_133:
<color=#c05100>[Basic Rules]</color>
1. The Seraphic Ruins contain multiple bosses. Defeating bosses will reward you with Artifacts, with higher-level bosses yielding higher-quality Artifacts.
2. Each boss has unique mechanics, requiring different team compositions to counter them.
3. Activating talents in the Hope Tree can significantly reduce the difficulty of the bosses.

<color=#c05100>[Challenge Rules]</color>
1. Each attempt to challenge a boss requires multiple teams to participate. As the boss's level increases, the number of required teams also increases, with a maximum of 3 teams.
2. The higher the damage each team deals to the boss, the greater the HP percentage the boss loses; however, there is a limit to the percentage damage a single team can deal.
3. The total percentage damage dealt during each challenge is the sum of the percentage damage dealt by all teams.

<color=#c05100>[Challenge Rewards]</color>
1. Reduce the boss's HP to a specified value to earn rewards.
2. A boss's HP does not regenerate during a season. When its HP reaches 0, the boss is killed.
3. Killing a boss at the current level unlocks the next level. Each boss has a total of 22 levels. Once all are killed, the Infinite Challenge will be unlocked. In the Infinite Challenge, defeated bosses will revive, allowing you to repeatedly challenge them and earn challenge rewards.

<color=#c05100>[Energy Recovery]</color>
1. Each challenge consumes 1 Light Energy.
2. Light Energy recovers at a rate of 1 point every 120 minutes, with a maximum storage of 30 points.
3. You can spend Diamonds to purchase additional Light Energy, with purchase attempts resetting weekly.
help.story_133:
The Seraphic Court has crumbled under the influence of abyssal power, shattering into several floating islands that barely hold together, bound only by chains.
The abyssal power has mutated the creatures on these islands, causing them to fight among themselves, leading to a protracted war.
To reclaim the lost Seraphic Court, many Divines have joined the fray. However, in countless battles, they have gradually lost their original purpose, becoming monsters driven only by the desire to kill.
Eliminating these monsters and restoring the former glory of the Seraphic Court is an urgent task!
help.rule_31501:
<color=#c05100>[Basic Rules]</color>
1. The Hope Tree is a progression system that resets each season.
2. The Hope Tree consists of multiple parts: Hope Tree Level, Team Bonuses, Primeval Realm Bonuses, and Season Mode Bonuses.
<color=#c05100>[Hope Tree Level]</color>
1. Consume Radiant Beads to level up the Hope Tree.
2. Increasing the Hope Tree's level enhances all heroes' stats during the season.
3. For every 10 levels increased, you will receive Azure Beads as rewards.
<color=#c05100>[Team Bonuses]</color>
1. Consume Azure Beads to level up Team Bonus Skills.
2. Once leveled up, your teams will receive the corresponding effect bonuses.
3. These bonuses are only effective in season modes.
<color=#c05100>[Season Mode Bonuses]</color>
1. Crimson Beads from Season Gifts can be used to level up Season Bonus Skills.
2. Once leveled up, they provide corresponding bonuses in the respective season mode.
<color=#c05100>[Primeval Realm Bonuses]</color>
1. Master Events in the Primeval Realm can level up Primeval Realm Bonus Skills.
2. Once leveled up, they provide corresponding bonuses in the Primeval Realm.
<color=#c05100>[Reset Rules]</color>
1. During the first 7 days of each season, resets are free, and 1 reset item is automatically added every 14 days.
2. Once reset, all Team Bonuses and Season Mode Bonuses will revert to Lv.0, and all upgrade materials will be refunded.
<color=#c05100>[Season Gift]</color>
1. Leveling up the Hope Tree allows you to complete level quests for corresponding rewards.
2. At the end of the season, rewards are sent out via mail based on the Hope Tree Level.
help.story_31501:
As the Eternal Relics continue to return, the abundant energy gathers in the Slates in the Valkyrie Hall.
The roots of the Hope Subtree are drawn to the power within the Slates, emerging from the depths of the hall to cling to the Slates and grow into the Hope Tree.
The Hope Tree and the Slates coexist, and their energies gradually merge, resulting in new strength from their blessings.
With these newfound blessings, embark once more to nurture the Hope Tree and continue the journey to reclaim the Relics!
help.rule_31505:
<color=#c05100>[Basic Rules]</color>
1. Displays the proportions of material consumption for various skills based on the Hope Tree data from all players across the servers.
<color=#c05100>[Team Bonuses]</color>
1. There are 8 types, with corresponding percentages shown based on the material consumption for each type.
2. Tapping on a specific type allows you to view the material consumption proportions for all passive skills under that type.
3. Tapping on a specific skill will display the distribution of its levels among players.
<color=#c05100>[Season Passive]</color>
1. There are 13 passive skills related to season modes, with corresponding percentages displayed based on each skill's material consumption.
help.rule_31504:
1. Season Synergies are exclusive to the current season and only take effect during the season.
2. Players can consume Synergy Awaken Tokens to activate Season Synergies for each hero. This item is obtained in the Tome of Itheron.
3. Deploying 3 or more heroes with the same Season Synergy grants a brand-new Season Synergy effect.
help.rule_31506:
<color=#c05100>[Basic Rules]</color>
1. The ranking is based on the Hope Tree Levels of all players in this War Zone.
2. There may be a slight delay in the ranking data, so please be patient.
help.rule_1002:
1. The ranking records the players who have cleared the highest level of each boss in the Seraphic Ruins this season.
2. If multiple players are at the same boss level, the players who dealt more damage to the boss will rank higher.
help.rule_134:
1. Halloween Decree starts and ends with the Demon Party event.

2. The total duration of the Halloween Decree event is 10 days.

3. Reach the required Decree Points within the event period to unlock the corresponding rewards. Daily logins will grant points throughout the event.

4. All unclaimed rewards will be sent to you via mail when Halloween Decree ends.

5. Unlock the Advanced Halloween Decree for better rewards. Players who purchase the Advanced Halloween Decree can use Diamonds to buy Decree Points if they haven't claimed all rewards by the fourth day before the reset.

6. Halloween Decree is only effective during its unlocked period; it is not permanent.
help.story_136: As the leisurely summer draws to a close, a colossal beast from the depths shatters the final moments of tranquility. Towering waves devour everything along the shore, and the vacation takes an unexpected turn...
help.rule_136: During the event, log in daily to receive a special gift. After logging in for 10 days, you can claim all rewards.
help.rule_137:
1. During the Treasure Recovery event, complete the corresponding quests to obtain Mysterious Starfish. Use the Mysterious Starfish to unlock treasures.

2. Each treasure contains several gifts. Find all the gifts to unlock the treasure and obtain the rewards.

3. Each treasure can only be unlocked once, and they are unlocked in order. The final treasure can be unlocked repeatedly for repeated rewards.

4. Mysterious Starfish can be purchased with Diamonds several days after the event starts, up to 35 times.

5. At the end of the event, any unused Mysterious Starfish will be converted into Diamonds.
help.rule_1011:
1. From Day 1 to Day 7 of a new server, the Valkyrie Synergy Archive Power event will be available.

2. You can claim rewards by meeting the required total Collection Power in the Valkyrie Synergy Archive.

3. At the end of the event, rank rewards will be distributed via mail based on the ranking.
help.rule_1012:
1. The ranking is based on the total Collection Power in the Valkyrie Synergy Archive among players on the server. In the event of a tie, players who reached the Power earlier will rank higher.

2. Different rank brackets correspond to different rank rewards, which will be distributed via mail at the end of the event.
help.rule_1011_1:
1. The ranking is based on the total Collection Power in the Valkyrie Synergy Archive among players on the server. In the event of a tie, players who reached the Power earlier will rank higher.

2. Different rank brackets correspond to different rank rewards, which will be distributed via mail at the end of the event.
help.rule_1013: When you collect the required number of heroes for the Valkyrie Synergy, you can claim the Synergy Activation Reward.
help.rule_317:
1. After the "Food Festival" limited event starts, specific features will grant limited-time exclusive event items, which can be exchanged for generous rewards in the corresponding shop.

2. You can obtain Strawberry Cakes through Vileflower Harvest, Celestial Trial sweeps, Idling in Missions, and Speed Up.

3. You can obtain Roast Chickens through Terra Occupation, the Arena, and Grayshroom Realm.

4. During the event, the Food Festival Shop will also be available, offering discounted Diamond Packs and generous rewards.
help.rule_318:
1. Food Decree starts and ends with the Food Festival event.

2. Reach the required Decree Points within the event period to unlock the corresponding rewards. Earning Activity from daily quests will grant points throughout the event.

3. All unclaimed rewards will be sent to you via mail when Food Decree ends.

4. Unlock the Advanced Food Decree for better rewards. Players who purchase the Advanced Food Decree can use Diamonds to buy Decree Points if they haven't claimed all rewards by the fourth day before the reset.

5. Food Decree is only effective during its unlocked period; it is not permanent.
help.rule_33003:
<color=#c05100>[Basic Rules]</color>
1. Alchemy Fountains are located in both the Royal City and Fortresses on the map. Occupying a fountain grants a continuous supply of Fountain Essence. Guild members can invite others to assist in challenges against Fountain Guards.
2. Royal City Fountain: Located beneath the Royal City, it provides Fountain Essence to all guild members. Its level can be upgraded through challenges to increase yield. The maximum level cap will gradually increase as the season progresses.
3. Fortress Fountain: Located beneath the fortress, it can only be claimed by guild members after their guild secures ownership of the fortress. Successfully completing challenges allows guild members to occupy the fountain and gain a continuous supply of Fountain Essence. If another guild takes over the fortress, the fountains within will also be lost.
<color=#c05100>[Challenge Rules]</color>
1. 10 challenge attempts are given at the start of the season. Subsequently, 1 challenge attempt is restored every 2 hours.
2. Challenges increase the fountain's occupation progress. When progress reaches 100%, the fountain is either fully occupied or upgraded.
<color=#c05100>[Assist Rules]</color>
1. 3 assistance attempts are given at the start of the season. Subsequently, 1 assistance attempt is restored every 8 hours.
2. Consume assistance attempts to help other guild members occupy fountains more quickly.
<color=#c05100>[Fountain Yield]</color>
1. Challenging or assisting with fountains rewards Fountain Essence, with higher-level fountains providing more Fountain Essence.
2. Occupied fountains produce Fountain Essence every round, with higher-level fountains yielding greater production.
3. There is a limit to the number of Fortress Fountains that can produce simultaneously. If the limit is reached, newly occupied fountains will not enter production unless their level exceeds that of the lowest-level fountain currently in production.
4. Level up Clash Techs to increase the maximum number of Fortress Fountains that can produce simultaneously.
<color=#c05100>[Fountain Essence]</color>
1. Fountain Essence obtained from fountains can be donated to the guild to level up Clash Techs.
help.story_330: In Clash Domain, ancient Alchemy Fountains, buried underground for millennia, have resurfaced. Omniguardians can continuously harvest Fountain Essence by establishing extraction facilities.
help.rule_33001:
<color=#c05100>[Rules]</color>
1. Obtain Fountain Essence by challenging and mining springs to level up Clash Techs, gaining substantial item rewards and bonuses in Clash Domain.
<color=#c05100>[Basic Rules]</color>
1. Various fountains exist on the map. After the guild occupies a fountain, members can mine the springs within it.
2. Each Alchemy Fountain allows guild members to mine up to 4 springs.
3. When a fountain is occupied by another guild, the mining progress of its springs will be lost.
4. Fountains are also present in the Royal City, and each guild member can mine up to 4 springs within it.
5. After each round of Clash Domain, the spring info will be reset along with the map.
<color=#c05100>[Fountain Essence]</color>
1. Fountain Essence obtained from fountains can be donated to the guild to level up Clash Techs.
<color=#c05100>[Challenge Rules]</color>
1. Challenge the Guardian Boss to increase the progress. The higher the damage dealt, the higher the progress made on the spring.
2. When the challenge progress reaches 100%, the corresponding spring enters the mining state and produces Fountain Essence every round. The higher the spring's level, the higher the yield each round.
3. The first time entering Clash Domain each season resets the challenge attempts to 10. Afterward, 1 challenge attempt is restored every 2 hours.
<color=#c05100>[Assist Rules]</color>
1. Each spring can be assisted 3 times, with each guild member only able to assist once on the same spring.
2. The higher the damage dealt during assistance, the higher the progress made on the spring.
3. After a guild member challenges any spring, other members may see that spring appear on the assistance list.
4. The first time entering Clash Domain each season resets the assistance attempts to 10. Afterward, 1 assistance attempt is restored every 8 hours.
<color=#c05100>[Fountain Yield]</color>
1. Challenging or assisting with fountains rewards Fountain Essence, with higher-level fountains providing more Fountain Essence.
2. When the challenge progress reaches 100%, the corresponding spring enters the mining state and produces Fountain Essence every round. The higher the spring's level, the higher the yield each round.
3. Each member has a limit to the number of springs they can mine simultaneously.
4. Level up Clash Techs to increase the maximum number of springs that can be mined simultaneously.
<color=#c05100>[Quest Rewards]</color>
1. By mining springs and upgrading Clash Techs, guild members can complete the corresponding quests and earn item rewards.
2. Quests are divided into Round Quests and Season Quests. Round Quests are specific to the current round of Clash Domain and reset at the start of the next round. Season Quests are specific to the current season and reset only when the season ends.
help.rule_33002:
<color=#c05100>[Basic Rules]</color>
1. Alchemy Fountains are located in both the Royal City and Fortresses on the map. Occupying a fountain grants a continuous supply of Fountain Essence. Guild members can invite others to assist in challenges against Fountain Guards.
2. Royal City Fountain: Located beneath the Royal City, it provides Fountain Essence to all guild members. Its level can be upgraded through challenges to increase yield. The maximum level cap will gradually increase as the season progresses.
3. Fortress Fountain: Located beneath the fortress, it can only be claimed by guild members after their guild secures ownership of the fortress. Successfully completing challenges allows guild members to occupy the fountain and gain a continuous supply of Fountain Essence. If another guild takes over the fortress, the fountains within will also be lost.
<color=#c05100>[Challenge Rules]</color>
1. 10 challenge attempts are given at the start of the season. Subsequently, 1 challenge attempt is restored every 2 hours.
2. Challenges increase the fountain's occupation progress. When progress reaches 100%, the fountain is either fully occupied or upgraded.
<color=#c05100>[Assist Rules]</color>
1. 3 assistance attempts are given at the start of the season. Subsequently, 1 assistance attempt is restored every 8 hours.
2. Consume assistance attempts to help other guild members occupy fountains more quickly.
<color=#c05100>[Fountain Yield]</color>
1. Challenging or assisting with fountains rewards Fountain Essence, with higher-level fountains providing more Fountain Essence.
2. Occupied fountains produce Fountain Essence every round, with higher-level fountains yielding greater production.
3. There is a limit to the number of Fortress Fountains that can produce simultaneously. If the limit is reached, newly occupied fountains will not enter production unless their level exceeds that of the lowest-level fountain currently in production.
4. Level up Clash Techs to increase the maximum number of Fortress Fountains that can produce simultaneously.
<color=#c05100>[Fountain Essence]</color>
1. Fountain Essence obtained from fountains can be donated to the guild to level up Clash Techs.
help.rule_331:
<color=#c05100>[Basic Rules]</color>
1. All guild members can donate Fountain Essence.
2. Tech skills automatically level up when the required amount of Fountain Essence is collected.
<color=#c05100>[Tech Bonuses]</color>
1. Clash Tech bonuses apply to the entire guild. Members will lose all bonus effects upon leaving the guild.
<color=#c05100>[Quest Rewards]</color>
1. Quests are divided into Round Quests and Season Quests.2. Round Quests: Can be completed during each round and last until the end of the current guild war.
2. Season Quests: Can be completed throughout the season and remain available until the season ends.
help.story_331: In Clash Domain, adventurers discovered the magical power contained within Fountain Essence, which can provide various benefits to the guild.
help.rule_33210:
1. Rally Command can be applied to grids occupied by your guild, increasing the corresponding grid's defenders by 30. This effect lasts until the ownership of the grid changes.
2. Each grid can have Rally Command used on it up to 10 times simultaneously.
3. Any unused Rally Command attempts will reset to 0 at the end of the season.
help.story_332: Long, long ago, in the castle of an ancient kingdom, there lived a princess...
help.story_139:
A letter carried by bubbles... Could it be from Leviathan in another dimension?

This displaced beast seems uninterested in destroying the world; she only loves holidays, beaches, and endless parties!

Step through the rift in this letter, leave all your troubles behind, and let the party begin!
help.rule_138:
1. This Decree starts and ends with the Summer Echo event.

2. The total duration of the Decree event is 14 days.

3. Reach the required Decree Points within the event period to unlock the corresponding rewards. Daily logins will grant points throughout the event.

4. All unclaimed rewards will be sent to you via mail when Decree ends.

5. Unlock the Advanced Decree for better rewards. Players who purchase the Advanced Decree can use Diamonds to buy Decree Points if they haven't claimed all rewards by the fourth day before the reset.

6. This Decree is only effective during its unlocked period; it is not permanent.
help.rule_139: During the event, log in daily to receive a special gift. After logging in for 10 days, you can claim all rewards.
help.rule_140:
1. In the Wavechaser Invite event, you can give different gifts to Leviathan to increase her Favor.

2. Once her Favor reaches a specified level, you will receive rewards.

3. Leviathan's mood will change, and with each mood shift, her preferred gifts will differ. Giving her the preferred gifts will further increase her Favor.

4. Gifts can be crafted by consuming the corresponding materials. Complete quests to get random materials.

5. After the event has been running for a certain number of days, you can purchase specific materials from the Diamond Sale shop.

6. The materials obtained during the event will disappear after the event ends.
help.story_33210: In Clash Domain, adventurers have uncovered various ancient skills through relentless effort, which can be utilized within Clash Domain.
help.rule_1015:
1. Prologue Decree unlocks on the 2nd day of character creation.

2. The total duration of the Prologue Decree event is 14 days.

3. Reach the required Daily Points within the event period to unlock the corresponding rewards. Reach the specified Daily Activity to get Daily Points.

4. All unclaimed rewards will be sent to you via mail when Prologue Decree ends.

5. Unlock the Advanced Prologue Decree and Special Prologue Decree for better rewards. Players who purchase the Advanced or Special Prologue Decree can use Diamonds to buy Decree Points if they haven't claimed all rewards by the fourth day before the reset.
help.story_1015: The mysterious objects that hold a part of the Supreme Will are known as "Decrees." Scholars in Mirlond have decoded the infinite secrets contained within these items and found that by meeting certain conditions, one can receive rewards from the Supreme Will. These conditions mainly involve defending against the Abyss invasion and enhancing oneself, precisely what the Omniguardians are doing. Even though the Supreme One has vanished, its influence on the world remains.
help.rule_332:
1. The event lasts for 7 days. New quests and shops unlock at midnight each day.

2. All unfinished quests will expire after the event. You can continue to buy supplies and claim the rewards you have already earned.

3. The event interface and portal close 1 day after the event ends.
help.rule_333:
1. The Rank Rush event of the season will be available from Days 1 to 5 following the reset of Rift Odyssey.

2. At the end of the event, rank rewards will be distributed via mail based on the Rift Odyssey Rankings.
help.story_333: To claim victory in the once-a-decade Sakura Tournament, the warriors of Harmony Isle sail across the seas. At the edges of the Shattered Realm of Itheron, they hone their swordsmanship through the grueling Rift Odyssey.
help.story_140: At the Lunar New Year Night Market, a crowd gathers in front of a small shop. The mysterious and enchanting shopkeeper accepts only Fortune Firecrackers, not gold or silver. As for what you can exchange them for… well, that depends on the whims of the paper-cut wheel!
help.rule_141:
1. Spend Fortune Firecrackers to spin the fortune wheel and win great prizes.

2. There are three grand prizes on the wheel, and each prize can only be won once.

3. Each spin that doesn't win a grand prize will accumulate one Luck Point. When your Luck Points are full, you're guaranteed to win a grand prize, and all Luck Points will reset.

4. Each day, upon first entering the event, you can choose a lantern. After using it, you'll receive a blessing the next time you spin the wheel.

5. Complete LNY Quests to earn Fortune Firecrackers.
help.rule_142: During the event, log in daily to receive an LNY gift. After logging in for 10 days, you can claim all rewards.
help.rule_143:
1. LNY Decree starts and ends with the Spring Festival Celebration event.

2. The total duration of the LNY Decree event is 14 days.

3. Reach the required Decree Points within the event period to unlock the corresponding rewards. Daily logins will grant points throughout the event.

4. All unclaimed rewards will be sent to you via mail when LNY Decree ends.

5. Unlock the Advanced LNY Decree for better rewards. Players who purchase the Advanced LNY Decree can use Diamonds to buy Decree Points if they haven't claimed all rewards by the fourth day before the reset.

6. LNY Decree is only effective during its unlocked period; it is not permanent.
help.rule_144:
1. During the Fate Summon event, players can use Fate SMN Scrolls to summon and select a preferred Synergy Mastery hero.

2. Each event offers one free summon upon its launch.

3. For every 50 summons, a selected hero is guaranteed. The counter resets each time the selected hero is obtained.

4. If summons are made during the current event but the selected hero is not obtained, the summon count will carry over to the next event.

5. Any remaining Fate SMN Scrolls can be retained for use in the next event.
help.story_144: The faces of the heroes appear upon the ancient crystal, and it allows you to intertwine with their fates. Select your desired hero and summon them using Fate SMN Scrolls!
help.story_27004: The decennial Tournament kicks off, drawing warriors from all corners of the world to compete for the coveted title of the world's strongest.
help.rule_27004:
1. Players are ranked based on the points they earn in the Tournament. The ranking includes the guild members of the 6 guilds in the Clash Domain.

2. Single Tournament Ranking: The ranking is based on the points earned during the current Tournament.

3. Overall Ranking: The ranking is based on the total points accumulated from all Tournaments during Clash Domain.

4. If a player leaves their guild during Clash Domain, their accumulated points will be cleared.
help.rule_27005:
1. Tournaments begin at the start of each Clash Domain. Each Tournament lasts for 3 rounds, and there are 4 Tournaments held per Clash Domain.

2. After a Tournament begins, your guild will be matched against 5 other guilds for competition.

3. During a Tournament, you can participate at any time by deploying multiple teams. The number of deployable teams matches the number allowed in Guild Wars (affected by the Hope Tree).

4. During battles, the system will match your teams against other players' teams. Each of your teams will face one opposing team.

5. After each battle, the surviving status of your team carries over. Victorious teams proceed to the next round, while defeated teams cannot continue.

6. At certain rounds, you can choose to revive a team, restore HP, or apply minor stat bonuses.

7. The Tournament ends when either the final round is completed or all teams are defeated.

8. Players earn Tournament Points for each victory and receive a random chest at the end of the battle.

9. The total points earned by all guild members contribute to the guild's Tournament Points. At the end of the Tournament, guilds will earn Clash Domain Points based on their rank.

10. Participating in Tournament battles during the season allows players to complete Tournament Quests. Completing these quests grants Activity, which can be exchanged for generous rewards once specific thresholds are reached.
help.rule_1014:
1. From Day 1 to Day 3 of a new server, the Penrose Rush event will be available.

2. At the end of the event, rank rewards will be distributed via mail based on the Palace Rankings.
help.rule_11013:
1. Synergy Summon Decree unlocks on the 2nd day of a new server.

2. The total duration of the activated Synergy Summon Decree is 7 days.

3. Daily logins will grant the corresponding rewards throughout the event.

4. All unclaimed rewards will be sent to you via mail when the decree ends.

5. Unlock the advanced decree for better rewards.
help.rule_1016:
1. From Day 4 to Day 10 of a new server, the Celestial Rush event will be available.

2. At the end of the event, rank rewards will be distributed via mail based on the total floors cleared in Celestial Trials.
help.rule_1017:
1. Increase the Player Level to obtain the corresponding rewards.

2. Obtain even greater rewards after you unlock the Level Fund.
help.story_1017: The mysterious objects that hold a part of the Supreme Will are known as "Decrees." Scholars in Mirlond have decoded the infinite secrets contained within these items and found that by meeting certain conditions, one can receive rewards from the Supreme Will. These conditions mainly involve defending against the Abyss invasion and enhancing oneself, precisely what the Omniguardians are doing. Even though the Supreme One has vanished, its influence on the world remains.
help.rule_1101:
1. The total duration of the Skin Decree event is 28 days.

2. Reach the required Decree Points within the event period to unlock the corresponding rewards. Daily logins will grant points throughout the event.

3. All unclaimed rewards will be sent to you via mail when Skin Decree ends.

4. Unlock the Advanced Skin Decree for better rewards. Players who purchase the Advanced Skin Decree can use Diamonds to buy Decree Points if they haven't claimed all rewards by the fourth day before the reset.
help.rule_31507:
<color=#c05100>[Allocation Plan Sharing]</color>
1. Players can share their current point allocation plans for the Hope Tree in the chat channel.
<color=#c05100>[Plan Saving]</color>
1. While viewing point allocation plans shared by other players in the chat channel, you can save them.
2. Saved plans can be reviewed here.
3. You can save up to 10 point allocation plans at the same time.
<color=#c05100>[Plan Replacement]</color>
1. Select a saved point allocation plan to consume 1 reset attempt and adjust your current plan to match the saved one.
2. If you lack the required upgrade materials, you won't be able to replace the corresponding plan.
help.rule_148:
1. Voyage Decree starts and ends with the Azure Voyage event.

2. The total duration of the Decree event is 14 days.

3. Reach the required Decree Points within the event period to unlock the corresponding rewards. Daily logins will grant points throughout the event.

4. All unclaimed rewards will be sent to you via mail when Decree ends.

5. Unlock the Advanced Decree for better rewards. Players who purchase the Advanced Decree can use Diamonds to buy Decree Points if they haven't claimed all rewards by the fourth day before the reset.

6. This Decree is only effective during its unlocked period; it is not permanent.
help.rule_150: During the event, log in daily to receive a special gift. After logging in for 10 days, you can claim all rewards.
help.rule_151:
1. During the Azure Voyage event, complete the corresponding quests to obtain Compasses. Use the Compasses to reveal cards.

2. Each stage contains several gifts. Find all the gifts in a stage to complete it and obtain the rewards.

3. Each stage can only be completed once, and they are opened in order. The last stage can be completed repeatedly to gain rewards again.

4. Starting from the 10th day of the event, Compasses can be purchased with Diamonds, up to 35 times.

5. At the end of the event, any unused Compasses will be converted into Diamonds.
help.story_147: Step onto the deck and feel the sea breeze! This journey takes us to the azure sea! As the thrilling adventure begins, the captain at the helm is a familiar figure...
help.rule_341:
1. The Champion's Journey event opens in 3 sequential phases. During each phase, complete the specific actions to earn points for that phase.

2. Reach point requirements to obtain valuable milestone rewards.

3. At the end of each phase, rank rewards will be distributed based on total points for that phase.

4. Points from all phases contribute to your total event points. When the final phase ends, the event concludes, and overall rank rewards will be distributed based on total points.
help.story_336: Treasures of pharaohs from generations past lie buried within this tomb. Powerful tomb guards stand as bastions behind its doors, eliminating all who dare to plunder its riches.
help.rule_336:
<color=#c05100>[Basic Rules]</color>
1. Tomb Treasures contain 6 gates and 6 bosses. Defeating the first 4 bosses at the Accessory Gates rewards Ancient Accessories, while defeating the last 2 bosses at the Material Gates rewards materials for purifying these accessories. Higher-level bosses drop higher-quality rewards.
2. Each boss has unique mechanics, requiring different team compositions to counter them.
3. Equipping Ancient Accessory talents of the corresponding level significantly reduces the difficulty of bosses.

<color=#c05100>[Challenge Rules]</color>
1. Each boss challenge requires 5 heroes to participate. After the battle, heroes need time to search for loot. The search time varies based on the number of rounds needed to clear. Fewer rounds mean shorter search time.
2. Heroes searching for loot cannot participate in battles at other gates, but you can search all 6 gates simultaneously.
help.story_3381: Said to be ancient sacred accessories inherited from the gods, their power appears to stem from unspeakable forbidden entities.
help.rule_3381:
1. All Contracted & Benedicted Heroes of Epic quality or higher can equip accessories.

2. Each accessory can only be equipped by heroes of the corresponding synergy.

3. Heroes in the list are sorted by their deployment frequency in season modes, with those deployed more frequently appearing first.

4. When using Equip All, the system will equip the highest-level accessories to heroes in list order.

5. You can lock accessories on specific heroes, and locked accessories will not be affected by the Equip All or Unequip All functions.
help.rule_3382:
1. Stats of accessories that are T9 or above can be upgraded.

2. Accessory Stats: Each accessory can have up to 3 stats, categorized as ALL/PVE/PVP types. Stats are only effective in their corresponding PvE or PvP season modes. The same accessory cannot have duplicate stat types.

3. Stat Enhancement: Each enhancement randomly increases the value of one stat.

4. Stat Purification: Select a stat to replace it with another of the same type while maintaining the current enhancement progress.
help.rule_3383:
1. Accessories disappear once dismantled, and materials are returned based on their level and quality.

2. A portion of materials spent on enhancing accessories will also be returned.

3. Equipped accessories cannot be dismantled.

4. A max of 15 accessories can be dismantled at a time.
help.story_152: This is your first encounter with Hestia, the Valkyrie of Forging, and she'll shower you with generous welcome gifts.Use Mythic Stones to have her forge ancient Relics for you, unleashing their boundless power!
help.rule_152:
1. Spend Mythic Stones II to forge Selectable Legendary Relic Shards.

2. Selectable Legendary Relics can be changed anytime during the event period.

3. Mythic Stones II can be retained forever and used in future events. Other event items will be reset when the event ends.
help.story_153: Monsters from the forest are swarming out in full force, but fortunately, we have the great witch, Lady Dorabella!
help.rule_153:
1. You need to control Lady Dorabella's left and right movements to fire magic projectiles at invading monsters.

2. Monsters will launch attacks once they reach your position.

3. Successfully clear the stage by defeating all monsters while preventing your position from being breached.

4. Defeat chests to obtain special skills that enhance Lady Dorabella, greatly improving your defensive capabilities.
help.story_154: Monsters from the forest are swarming out in full force, but fortunately, we have the great witch, Lady Dorabella!
help.rule_154:
1. After the "Forest Frenzy" limited event starts, players can earn rewards by participating in "Forest Defense" stages. Limited-time exclusive items can be exchanged for generous rewards in the corresponding shop.

2. During the event, claim generous rewards through "Spring Login" every day.

3. After clearing "Forest Defense" stages, claim generous rewards through "Forest Decree."

4. During the event, the Discount Shop will also be available, offering discounted Diamond Packs with generous rewards.
help.story_155: Monsters from the forest are swarming out in full force, but fortunately, we have the great witch, Lady Dorabella!
help.rule_155:
1. The Forest Decree event lasts 14 days.

2. Accumulate Login Points during the event to claim the corresponding rewards.

3. All unclaimed rewards will be sent to you via mail when the decree ends.
help.story_156: Merchants from the Shattered Realm arrive at the start of each new season, offering generous gifts in exchange for tokens from the previous season.
help.rule_156:
1. The Season Shop opens at the start of each season and remains available for a limited time.

2. You can exchange Fracture Badges earned at the end of the previous season for items..

3. Any unused Fracture Badges will be cleared after the shop closes, so make sure to spend them before then.
help.rule_3384:
1. Excess Awaken Orders can be converted. After conversion, you will first receive random Awaken Orders that have not yet reached their limit.

2. You can convert up to 15 Awaken Orders at once.

3. If the selected Awaken Orders exceed the convertible amount, the excess will be returned to your Inventory.
help.story_346:
1. During the Festival Event, three premium packs will refresh daily: Free Pack, Diamond Pack, and Oath Crystal Pack.

2. Claim the Free Pack by logging in daily, obtain the Diamond Pack with a small amount of Diamonds, and get high-value Oath Crystal rebate packs through recharging.
help.rule_346:
1. During the Festival Event, three premium packs will refresh daily: Free Pack, Diamond Pack, and Oath Crystal Pack.

2. Claim the Free Pack by logging in daily, obtain the Diamond Pack with a small amount of Diamonds, and get high-value Oath Crystal rebate packs through recharging.
help.story_347:
1. Once the feature is activated, players can claim one Legendary Hero with each daily login.

2. Every 7 days, players can claim a D/D Selectable Legendary Hero.

3. By accumulating 42 daily logins, players can obtain a total of 42 Legendary Heroes.

4. The feature will be disabled after all rewards have been claimed.
help.rule_347:
1. Once the feature is activated, players can claim one Legendary Hero with each daily login.

2. Every 7 days, players can claim a D/D Selectable Legendary Hero.

3. By accumulating 42 daily logins, players can obtain a total of 42 Legendary Heroes.

4. The feature will be disabled after all rewards have been claimed.
help.story_157: The pointer spins, and the prizes keep coming. Tonight, you are the lucky star!
help.rule_157:
1. Spend Wheel Tickets to spin the fortune wheel and win great prizes.

2. There are three grand prizes on the wheel, and each prize can only be won once.

3. Each spin that doesn't win a grand prize will accumulate one Luck Point. When your Luck Points are full, you're guaranteed to win a grand prize, and all Luck Points will reset.

4. The first time you enter the event each day, you can choose a commemorative coin. After using it, you'll receive a blessing the next time you spin the wheel.

5. Complete Wheel Quests to earn Wheel Tickets.
help.story_158: Amaterasu has set up a Lucky Wheel game at the Campus Gala. She seems distracted, her gaze wandering as if searching for someone important...
help.rule_158: During the event, log in daily to receive a special gift. After logging in for 10 days, you can claim all rewards.
help.rule_159:
1. Youth Decree starts and ends with the Campus Gala event.

2. The total duration of the Decree event is 14 days.

3. Reach the required Decree Points within the event period to unlock the corresponding rewards. Daily logins will grant points throughout the event.

4. All unclaimed rewards will be sent to you via mail when Decree ends.

5. Unlock the Advanced Decree for better rewards. Players who purchase the Advanced Decree can use Diamonds to buy Decree Points if they haven't claimed all rewards by the fourth day before the reset.

6. Youth Decree is only effective during its unlocked period; it is not permanent.
help.story_3431: This is an ancient, unknown realm where neither gods nor demons exist, and where neither the Abyss nor the Celestials have manifested. Ancient dragons and colossal beasts rule the skies, land, and seas, cultivating their own brilliant civilization.
help.rule_3431:
1. Primeval Realm is a brand-new season mode offering players a free exploration experience.

2. Players can explore the Primeval Realm, occupy map grids, and participate in various events (such as Battle, Trade, Altar, and Story) to earn rewards that are beneficial both within and outside of season modes.

3. Gameplay: Fight wild monsters → Unlock various events → Earn rewards through events.

4. Monster battles: Battles consume Energy, which replenishes daily and can be supplemented with Energy Berries. Monster battles reward Artifacts.

5. Trade events: Buy and sell various goods across the realm to earn Primeval Coins, which can be used to purchase items in the shop.

6. Master events: Provide goods as requested by the Master to learn skills from the Season Talent Tree.

7. Altar events: Choose random map buffs from altars to make exploration more efficient.
help.rule_3432:
1. Battles consume Energy, which replenishes daily and can be supplemented with Energy Berries.

2. When battling bosses, you can counter them using skills from the Talent Tree.
help.rule_3433:
1. Primeval Coins can be used to purchase goods across various regions, where the same items are priced identically.

2. Players can sell goods from their bag at any time.

3. When players participate in various events across the realm, price fluctuations will occur, which should be monitored closely.

4. Activating relevant skills in the Season Talent Tree can further reduce purchase prices and increase selling prices.

5. Activating buffs from altars around the map can also influence prices.
help.rule_3434:
1. Altars affect event outcomes within several surrounding grids on the map.

2. Players need to select one of three buffs, or spend Diamonds to refresh the buff options.

3. The refresh cost increases incrementally but will reset after a period of time.
help.rule_3435:
1. The Exploration Ranking records players with the highest exploration progress in the Primeval Realm.

2. The Coin Ranking records players who have accumulated the most Primeval Coins in the Primeval Realm.
help.rule_349:
1. Weekly Decree starts and ends with the current season.

2. The Weekly Decree event runs for 8 weekly periods, totaling 56 days.

3. Reach the required Decree Points within the event period to unlock the corresponding rewards. Complete daily quests for Daily Activity or weekly quests for Weekly Activity to earn Decree Points. Every 20 Daily Activity grants 20 points, and every 20 Weekly Activity grants 50 points.

4. All unclaimed rewards will be sent to you via mail when Weekly Decree ends.

5. Unlock advanced decrees for better rewards. The two advanced decrees are calculated separately.

6. Weekly Decree is only effective during each unlocked period; it is not permanent.
